name: Infinity Imperium
description: Choose your civ, expand your empire, fight for the supremacy, travel through time to change the course of history, discover what’s happened to the Infinitians before the end in this new space RTS!

name: Metal Mars
description: Metal Mars is a real time strategy game where you race to gather resources and build on mars! This game can be played locally with a shared screen with up to three friends (4 players total). There are also 30 challenges to complete against the CPU!

name: Best Miner
description: Best Miner - Top Down Shooter, with a lot of monsters and increasing difficulty from each passed game. Build a strategy, and by switching ranged and melee combat, destroy all enemies on your way.

name: Squares Rage
description: Have you ever played a game that is so fun, but is also so infuriating that you wanted to throw your keyboard against the wall? Squares Rage is one of those. You have been warned.

name: Line Leader
description: Take the role of Line Leader, as you and your fellow students try to escape school. Avoid hazards and gather as many students as possible to escape each room. Adventure through different areas of the school, defeating bosses and solving puzzles as you find your way out.

name: Project Bullet
description: Project Bullet is a side-scrolling bullet hell game, which sets in Pistalia, the fantasy world where people get the blessing from their god this power came to be known as ''Bullet'', Escape from the evil empire, find valuable allies, arm yourself with powerful gadgets and destroy all your enemies!

name: Death Box
description: Death Box is a brutal fast-paced action platformer where both you and your enemies die in one hit. If you wish to defeat the forces of evil that have invaded the lands, you must survive 15 levels of blood pumping 1-3 minutes of incoming waves of demons!

name: Rocket Stop Incident
description: Rocket Stop Incident is an atmospheric first-person horror game with puzzle elements.

name: Pendle Hill
description: Pendle Hill is a unique and intense single player open-world survival horror game. The game is loosely based on a real life location with a dark past. Immerse yourself in an amazingly detailed world and find out who you really are and what you are made of!

name: This Is Not Chess
description: A turn-based tactics game about goofy characters with wide and varied techniques duking it out across a bright and colourful battlefield.

name: Pon Para and the Unconquerable Scorpion
description: Reunite with old allies and find new ones to raise an army that can end the Stormraider War…and stop a mad god from destroying the World That Remains.

name: My Nuclear Octopus
description: My Nuclear Octopus is a psychedelic retro arcade game for fans of pure out-and-out arcade blasters that takes two minutes to learn and hours to master! It's an overload of sight and sound for you to lose yourself in. Can you make it to the top of the leaderboard?

name: Indoorlands
description: Indoorlands is an amusement park management game where you can control your rides and freely design your halls. Create and expand your individual indoor park to inspire your visitors. Let your creativity run wild, but keep an eye on your finances!

name: Snow Survival
description: As a result of a heavy snowfall, the passenger plane crashes on a deserted and cold island. You are the only survivor of the plane and get ready to explore this cold forest.

name: Flower Paradise
description: Welcome to Flower Paradise! Solve your way through unique flower puzzles in order to turn a patch of dirt into your own beautiful garden! Customize your garden with flowers, plants, birds, butterflies, fish, hedges, statues and more as you unlock each feature using your Match 3 skills. Once you have your garden exactly the way you like it, you can turn it into wallpaper for your desktop, or even an animated screensaver!

name: Revolution Triumph
description: Revolution Triumph - step-by-step strategy for the Russian Civil war. The game reflects the events of the battle of Tsaritsyn. You will have to manage the course of hostilities, as well as monitor the situation on the entire southern front.

name: Tales of Esferia: Araxis
description: A story-driven puzzle adventure with a shared spotlight between two intergalactic freelancers who get dragged into a series of peculiar events happening on a strange alien planet.

name: Childhood Fears
description: We all had nightmares when we were kids. We were scared of the monsters that might have been hiding in the closet and under the bed, but they were just nightmares. Right?

name: Dome Discover
description: Adventure RPG with anime aesthetics set in a world populated by Domes, places where humans live without being able to escape. Do you dare to leave these places and know the truth?

name: Loop Knight
description: A retired Knight man became a factory manager, constantly producing small Knight robots. And use the robot that passed the test to harass his old friend, demon king, day and night.

name: Unconventional Ragdoll Game
description: A relaxing game

name: Goblin Dungeoneer
description: Prepare for "Hell in Video Game Form" in this brutal, tough as nails, retro, platforming-adventure game! Save your starving tribe by collecting riches within a spike filled dungeon!

name: Paranormal Syndrome 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Aka no Sekai
description: A guy named Akira comes back from the store and suddenly the world around him looks a little different from before: everything looks reddish and strange animals roam around. Will he be able to find a way out?

name: Oni Asobi
description:
In the village, there is a small temple near the school. Rumors say that Oni-hime-sama's spirit, fearsome being, sometimes takes away the people who go to the temple.

One day when Shuu and Kana were talking about this urban legend, Kensuke, their friend, decides to the temple to bring them proof that the story is fake. A week goes by and Kensuke is still missing. Shuu decides to go to the temple in search of clues to the whereabouts of his friend. Could it be that Oni-hime-sama really took him away?

name: Mayohiga
description: Sin descripción

name: Casos Extravagantes Poco Complicados
description: Game made with Twine in 3 days for an exam at the "Argentina Image Campus" institute. A particular case of Detective Paymore and his daughter, so complex that it emerges from its own reality.

name: Kansensei Nightmare
description: Hellen and Cru wake up in an abandoned hospital. However Hellen has no recollection of her memories or her parents. Together with Cru, they must explore this strange world in order to find out more about Hellen's missing memories.

name: Kioku Shoujo
description: Nozomi Sora is a girl that wakes up without remembering what happened. Scared and worried, she starts looking for her family and answers about what happened. What did really happen? What is that shadow that is after her?

name: Glyph VR
description: Glyph is a free-to-play virtual reality game where you control a ball-shaped mechanical scarab from a third-person perspective. You are challenged to use precision and speed to collect relics and artifacts to complete levels.

name: Urbek City Builder
description: Urbek is a city building game where you can build your own neighbourhoods: from nightlife district to industrial district. Don't exhaust your natural resources before you have an educated population to build more efficient structures.

name: TPM Football
description: Inspired by football classics, TPM has 11v11 gameplay, team matches, skill challenges, community events and best of all, huge amount of customization! Style your player with dozens of hairstyles! Make your own team or join one! Become a goalkeeper if you want! Play on 4 different servers or make one for your friends! Limitless skillcap but easy mouse and keyboard controls.

name: Wendy Whedon
description: Free western/fantasy point-and-click adventure game made with Adventure Game Studio.

name: Dogz 4
description: The world-famous virtual Petz palz are back on your computer and now they're ready to travel the world. Train and play with your Petz in great new scenes. Voice Recognition adds a whole new dimension of interaction with your Dogz. Explore four exciting new lands with your Dogz: Gypsy Carnival--travel through time and space to Eastern Europe where you train your Dogz to perform tricks under the Big Top in the Gypsy Circus; Wild West--watch out for tumbleweeds as your Dogz amble down the dusty street in the Wild West; Arabian Desert--the intrigue of Arabian Nights calls for you and your Dogz as you uncover the mysteries of the desert Oasis; and Winter Wonderland--play in the outdoor Winter Wonderland where sledding is a must and hot soup is a welcome treat.

name: Dogz 3: Your Virtual Petz
description:
In Dogz 3, you can select a dog, name it, adopt it, and then take it home to your desktop and watch it grow day by day. In this version, several new breeds have been added. You can also dress your mutts in a variety of clothing including hats, sweaters, and pants.

This version also supports several different backgrounds including a kitchen, a backyard, a living room, and more. Take your pet to the different rooms and watch the fun. All of the rooms have some new features also, and you can light the fire in the living room and put items in the kitchen refrigerator.

Designed to entertain the whole family, Dogz 3 can be run as a screensaver or behind your windows so your dogs can grow to adults faster than in previous versions. By purchasing Catz3, you can watch your dog and cat grow up and play together.

name: Bare Knuckle III
description: Bare Knuckle III is the Japanese version of Streets of Rage 3. The Japanese version is known for having a more balanced challenge due to some gameplay changes made to the Western version in its localization. The plot was also heavily modified.

name: Tempest: Treasure Lands
description:
Dozens Islands of Paradise
For Some it's A Blessing
For Others...
It's A Curse.

name: Blooming Business: Casino
description: Blooming Business: Casino is a business tycoon sim with a narrative twist. Build and run your own fantasy casino in a bustling world full of animals, drama and danger.

name: Cold Case Summer
description: Cold Case Summer is the ninth game in the long-running series of first-person adventure games from developer MDNA games. This is a point-and-click adventure game that involves exploring for clues and inventory items, as well as solving logic and inventory-based puzzles. The game's artwork is made from still photographs taken in Sweden, with node-based movement. As with previous games in the series, there is voice acting and background music. There is a new hotspot revealer making it somewhat easier to locate items of interest.

name: Why Pizza?
description:
"Baba is you" meet "Getting over it" to deliver the best pizza and try not to get bankrupt!

Why Pizza? is a platformer, physical simulator, and delivery job simulator. You have to deliver pizza, get your payment and survive this day, if you have not enough money you'll lose your house, food, and life, so be careful and work hard!

name: Assassin’s Creed Rogue: Time Saver - Collectibles Pack
description: This pack will save you time by revealing all of the collectibles locations on your map.

name: Assassin’s Creed Rogue: Templar Legacy Pack
description: Become the most feared Templar whether on land or at sea, geared up with any weapons, outfits and ship items anyone could dream of.

name: Assassin's Creed III: The Battle Hardened Pack
description: The Battle Hardened Pack extends the Assassin’s Creed III multiplayer experience with three new playable characters and maps, plus awesome bonus items! Become the influential Governor, the resilient Highlander, or the fearsome Coyote Man.

name: Assassin's Creed III: The Hidden Secrets Pack
description: The Hidden Secrets Pack for Assassin's Creed III adds three extra missions for an additional hour of gameplay, taking you from the Lost Mayan Ruins to the high seas. Every success is rewarded with an in-game weapon!

name: Assassin's Creed Rogue: Time Saver - Activities Pack
description: This pack will save you time by revealing all of the activity locations on your map.

name: Connect the Dots
description: Relaxing logic puzzle that challenge your mind.

name: One Hell of a Trip
description: This is a 2D double joystick action adventure game, play as an innocent soul who falls into hell, pick up your weapon and use the power of different magic elements to fight for survival in the dungeon full of traps and monsters.

name: Worst Nightmare
description: Worst nightmare is a first person horror puzzle game. A game about living through a nightmare.

name: Reverie Knights Tactics
description: Reverie Knights Tactics is a turn-based tactical RPG with strategic battles in isometric grids where every decision can alter the story. Travel through a hand-drawn fantasy world and lead your heroes in a story-rich adventure, visual novel style!

name: CoronaViruses
description: Be quick to think, as you progress in the game you use more and more logic in a fun puzzle.

name: I'm a King
description: Role-playing strategy "I'm a King". Rule the kingdom, decide the fate of people, investigate, survive during periods of dark storms. This is only a small part of what you have to do.

name: AnyWay!: Challenge #1
description: AnyWay! - Challenge #1 Challenges mean new locations and levels to pass through. The levels are more difficult than the main storyline. They require proper training, skills and reaction!

name: Medium-naut
description:
This is an SF-horror/action game created by Takumi Naramura, creator of the hit 2D action series La-Mulana.
Naramura’s first foray into solo game development in years.

name: Steel Sword Story S
description: A work that revives the memories of many masterpiece action games you played in the past, 8bit-style 2D action game “1001 Spikes” (Thousand One Spikes) and many other indie game creators “8bits fanatics” produced pixel art delicately expressed graphics and game design that will not make players bored. It is a game of the world view cultivated in a shadowy atmosphere that drifts throughout the work.

name: Buraigun: Galaxy Storm
description:
A vertical STG that reproduces the atmosphere of an arcade game of the 90’s.
Take on the battle with 3 types of weapons, 2 types of formations, and bombs!

name: Snow Fighters
description:
This is the Nintendo Switch version of “Snow Fighters” on sale on Steam.

It features a simple yet profound system that creates Yukidama and beats the opponent.
Aim for victory by operating all 6 characters with different stats and special moves!
New stages, new characters, and story modes will be added to the Nintendo Switch version!

name: Block Slime Cave
description: Let's aim for the goal by using the block slime that lives in the cave and the characteristic that you can jump big when you ride.

name: Horror Story: Hallowseed
description: Horror Story: Hallowseed is a story-driven psychological horror game. An obscure event causes two of your friends to disappear while you were camping in the woods. Left alone and stranded in an unknown place, you need to seek the answers about what happened, face the horror and find your friends

name: Please, Don't Touch Anything: Classic
description: Please, Don’t Touch Anything: Classic is a pixelated, brain-racking, button-pushing puzzle game. Covering for a colleague taking a bathroom break, you find yourself in front of a mysterious panel with a green screen monitor above it showing a blurry live image of an unknown city. Also present is an ominous red button with the simple instruction to not touch anything! Push the red button once or press it many times. Your choices and actions will lead to outrageous consequences and 25 unique puzzle endings. Scavenge for clues, tools, and buttons to solve riddles and trigger explosive events. This deceptively simple console has many mind-blowing surprises for you. Go ahead, press the button. You know you want to.

name: Tybot Invasion: The Typing Runner
description: Type words quickly to destroy robots, move among lanes, and destroy all the enemy's waves on this invasion that mixes Typing & Run! The future of Robworld is in your hands, can you destroy all robots fast enough? Type for your life. Type for the future.

name: Don't Die
description: Henry Baker is a normal guy. Really. So after another day of work, it's your job to help him go through his evening and finally go to bed. Easy, right?

name: Bury
description:
Coco loses her most treasured notebook.
Perhaps it's in that place...
But that place is somewhere I definitely shouldn't go to, right?
Relying on those words, Coco goes off to look for her notebook.

name: Follow the Darkness
description: A young girl awakes from a coma to find her memories of the last month gone. Pursued by the Fox God seeking atonement for a forgotten sin, she has only a few days to retrace her steps and find out how to avert the curse.

name: Good Bye Rebeca
description:
This is an adventure of mystery and suspense that tells the story of Rebecca Bradley, she is 15, who awakens one night in the basement' home with a letter from her parents that says "Goodbye Rebeca".

Now she will must find her parents to know why they abandoned her. She knows she always has been a good girl but what she will discover at home and around will reveal her the great truth.

name: Happy Birthday
description:
When a party for a wealthy family’s ten-year-old daughter ends with the birthday girl dead, her older sister missing, and the father refusing to call the police, the detective isn’t exactly conventional. She finds herself at the site of the crime – a rented out old mansion – without any trace of memory. It’s the landlady who tells her that she is a private investigator who’s been hired to catch the culprit and bring them to justice.

But how can she solve a murder when she can’t even deduce her own name? Was it one of the party-goers who did the young guest of honor in? …Or was it the ghost said to wander the haunted halls? Can she manage to find the missing girl before another tragedy takes place?

…And will she be able to sleuth out her own memories and the meaning behind their disappearance at the same time?

name: Delicatte
description:
Delicatte is a game about a little girl named Chisaki, who wants to find her reason to live/happiness. She travels through a weird land and asks people for help. They appear as weird aliens or objects - look for them.

The purpose of this game is to make someone feel better after playing. Especially if You are sad.

name: BS F-Zero Grand Prix 2
description: This is the SoundLink version of BS F-Zero Grand Prix 2, which is the direct sequel to the original F-Zero game released for the Super Famicom via the Satellaview. Two versions were released - a non-SoundLink game and a SoundLink game. Little is known about this SoundLink version outside of surviving videos, but it was distributed in two halves in August 1997 and had a similar announcer and redone soundtrack as the previous Satellaview entry. At least the first week rearranged a few courses, and replaced two with new locations called "Forest I" and "Forest II". Presuming no areas were repeated, this likely means the SoundLink version had twice as many courses total. In addition, it can be seen that the player cannot choose between Grand Prix and Practice modes in the SoundLink version; as it was a live broadcast, the player is forced to play each course in a timed Practice mode, and then the Grand Prix race.

name: Hide and Seek: Story of Dorothy
description: Dorothy, who fell asleep in the closet while playing Hide and Seek. Coming out of the closet after waking up, she couldn't remember why she was there in the first place. In order to solve this mystery, Dorothy started to explore the house.

name: The Last Plague: Blight
description:
The Last Plague: Blight is an extremely challenging and realistic single-player top-down perspective survival game.

The game takes place in a time long ago, just as a new disease called the Blight appears out of nowhere and begins enveloping the world. You escaped as it took over your village and now find yourself alone in the wilderness, tired and hungry.

The game is for players that are looking for an immersive survival game experience with a decent amount of realism and depth. All the while trying to manage the countless threats the wilderness and the Blight throws at you.

name: Very Pink Game
description: Play as Ivy, a lonely little girl living in a very pink town who has received a letter from her dear old friend. Ivy must find items and complete a series of tasks in order to see her again. Includes many ghosts, trees, a convenience store, a narcoleptic ghost hunter, and a punk who's in love with a donut witch.

name: Painted Heart
description:
Art has blessed many people with freedom, expression, and innovation. When a world that cherishes art through the use of the magical art, Pictomancy, one could say the art where paints come to life is a unique cultural gift for all to enjoy. If only that apex of cultural renaissance could stay that way like a dream.

Near the village of Appleby, a young and aspiring painter, Corbin, is prodded into the cathedral’s painting to cleanse the vibrant world from cultural extinction by the Pestilence. To this day, nobody knows where the Pestilence had come from, and Corbin is even less sure how he can help restore the infected painting.

name: Listen
description: The puppetman is a creature that wanders the earth, unseen by almost everybody who is not close to death, but always ignored. He has almost given up on finding somebody to listen to his stories, when he meets a young girl who lives in a german hospice. As they open up for a quite unusual friendship, the little girl learns more about the puppetman's past and the reason he remains unseen. But can she save him? Or does he save her?

name: White Sky
description:
A fourth-grader lives in a society without creativity, in which your school grades are the sole factor which determine your success. But there is a house nearby her own that is known for containing some source of creativity: as it is the only part of the town with color. She is told to never enter.
One day, however, she does, and enters the world of another fourth-grader named Toby, who also lives in a world bereft of creativity. He is the only one who can see her, which makes him appear insane, if his aberrational personality and appearance weren't enough. After a certain amount of time, however, she disappears back to her own world, leaving him alone until she enters the house again. As a part of his mind, she witnesses the climbs and downfalls of his subconscious.

name: Tetracosm
description: Tetracosm is a 2D adventure platformer. Be a yellow lizard on a bizarre and epic quest.

name: It Takes the Ball
description: Be careful! The game may be strongly condemned by dog lovers!Because if you don't play well, the cute dog in the game will die in front of you.Use the mouse to control the pitch of the racket.Waving the racket to control the ball is the trick of this game.

name: Diamond Mirage
description: Follow Ellyn, a young elf kidnapped from home to be trained as a slave. The nightmare begins. Can he escape the oppression or will he succumb to the world of pleasure?

name: Erotic Jigsaw Puzzle 3
description: Challenging 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring hardcore sex scenes by Lolita LineArt, on a smooth luxury graphical background.

name: Zombies Desert and Guns
description: After the terrible virus, only one survivor remained on the planet. Will he be able to cope with such a sudden responsibility and find at least someone on his way, except for a whole horde of zombie people?

name: Ninja Ken
description: Ninja Ken is a classic platformer game that brings your childhood back. Mind the obstacles, traps on road. Collect the coins and be rewarded with power-up in shop. Kill the enemies as much as you can to achieve high score.

name: Animal Memory
description: Animal Memory is a game with beautiful graphics and terrifying music. Puzzle, in the style of "animal", you will like it.The game develops memory well, the goal of the game is to find paired cards in the allotted time. Passing levels you will receive points.

name: Jolly Bunny's Adventure
description: А short game about a rabbit who intends to reunite with his family.

name: Universe For Sale
description: Universe for Sale is a sci-fi narrative experience about human relationships and self-acceptance, follow the stories of the nameless Master, a mysterious cultist and Lila the universes vendor.

name: Just 15 minutes
description: "Just 15 minutes" is an extreme 2D platformer that will make you sweat. Why? Because you have only 15 minutes to get out of the fortress filled with deadly traps!

name: Might & Trap: Apocalypse
description: Fantastic 3D defense game with lots of strategic decisions. A mutating, alien menace is ruining the world. Use spells and traps wisely to repel the undead hordes and save the survivors. You must carefully manage your crew and resources as you try to uncover the terrible secrets of the undead.

name: Conglomerate 451: Overloaded
description: Conglomerate 451: Overloaded is here! Face a cyber world in a grid-based, dungeon crawling first-person RPG with roguelike elements. You are the CEO of a Special Agency, instructed by the Senate of Conglomerate city to restore the order in sector 451, where corrupted corporations have established their turfs. Thanks to the last constitutional decree, you are allowed to create human clones. Build your own team, manipulate DNA, train your agents, equip them with high-end weapons, choose what cyberlimbs to implant, and send the squad to the field with only one goal: eradicate crime and restore order at any cost.

name: Squabble
description: Choose your favourite sibling character and own others in-game. Attack your opponents or play defensively, use the environment to your advantage. Trap your opponents or just get rid of them in the old-fashioned way. Be mindful of your surrounding as the world around you changes and reveals its not-so-friendly face. You can play in a party of 4 players in the local multiplayer and fight for the ultimate victory. Game characters are children siblings fighting each other as they always do using any means necessary - exploding pillows, water guns, by unleashing monsters and also with the worst thing ever - their homework. The desire to win is great, following squabble is even greater. Let's dive into atmosphere of pixel art couch playstyle. With your skill growing there comes even bigger passion for win. Explore vivid rooms, extremely dangerous and be ready to squabble!

name: Path: Through the Forest
description:
In this puzzle game you controll a girl by taping on the blocks you want her to move on and have to collect all gems and get to the gate to finish a level.
Levels are organized in five times of day, each with there own unique mechanic.

name: Idol Days
description: A love-adventure game where you can enjoy the heart-pounding roommate life of a rookie producer and a delinquent girl turned idol. A young man working at an Akihabara-based agency that manages underground idol groups has been ordered to discover new idols by his boss. Now, he's at the end of his rope. The protagonist is at a loss, finding that girls with the talent to become the kind of idol he's picturing are few and far between. He's sitting defeated on a park bench when he comes across a girl singing to herself while feeding some cats. The girl's song is delicate, but her voice shakes him to the core. His heart stolen in an instant, the protagonist turns to the girl and tries to scout her to become an idol. However, the girl flatly refuses him, saying the idea is stupid, only to then disappear. The next day, the protagonist gets called into the office, where he learns that the daughter of their sponsor has been hired as a member of staff and gets assigned to be her training supervisor. The girl who appears before the bewildered young man is the same one who turned down his scouting offer the day before. The girl's name is Tsubaki Akanesaki. Though she's had several jobs, she got fired from all of them for getting into fights. What does fate have in store for a young man who's been assigned to train a girl whose a total delinquent?!

name: Puzzle Box 3 in 1
description: Puzzle Box 3 in 1 is a small puzzle collection of the top trending puzzle games. In Crazy Numbers you swipe up numbered blocks in a row to merge same numbers up or you add or subtract numbers to match the same numbers in a grid of blocks in merge plus. And in connect the dots you connect the same color with a line without crossing another one. Enjoy!

name: Animus: Revenant
description: “Blood for blood. That which is taken shall be returned.” Keeper of this unremembered refuge, the danger is here. A blood debt incurred long ago is to be collected to bring about the end. Summoned from humanity’s last breaths of desperation, you are all that stands between Cadmeia and its annihilation. Find and seize the blood memories of old, lest those that intend suffering and harm unending should wield them. Brace yourself. Kerr, Breaker of Worlds, is come.

name: Pix Jungle Adventures
description: Pix Jungle Adventures is a jump and run platformer game where you explore different levels and experience awesome boss fights and tricky platformer puzzles. Features: - 55 Levels - Awesome pixel graphics - simple controls

name: Hero Pop
description: Help the Hero Matrix patrol the city she protects. Match 3 or more of the same colors to clear the bubbles and saved the babies. 200 levels of puzzles to play from. Various powers to use in each level.

name: Kirakira Stars Idol Project Ai
description: What if your childhood friend grew up into a gorgeous young lady? What if she asked you to move in with her? What if the two of you joined forces to make her the hottest new pop idol sensation? Follow fledgling idol Ai and producer Nobu as they navigate the ups and downs of life, love, and the entertainment industry in this visual novel adventure! -STORY- The entertainment industry is a battlefield. In recent years, countless pop idols have launched new careers, some achieving fame and fortune, others falling into obscurity. Competition is so fierce, people have started referring to this era as the "Warring Idols Period." Down on his luck and forced to leave his employee dorm, young producer Nobuyuki Kinoshita runs into an old friend, Ai Amane. Little does he know that this chance reunion will have far-reaching consequences. After inviting Nobuyuki to move in with her, and learning that his company is running low on talent, Ai makes a suprising declaration: "I want to be an idol!" Now, Ai is determined to help Nobu save ODA Productions from bankruptcy, and to transform her own life on the path to becoming an idol.

name: IsoCubes
description: IsoCubes is an isometric puzzle game. Your goal is to push the green starred cubes on their target cubes that are also green.

name: Brian the Brain
description: Jump and grab to climb the difficult mountain of knowledge in this challenging 2D physics and platform game.

name: Superpantsu Harematchii
description:
A naughty single player deck builder rogue-like with match-3 puzzle mechanics.

Collect cards to make your deck stronger and coins to buy potions and unlock new cards while working your way through matches against cute monsters and anime girls.

Use the match-3 puzzle mechanic to collect mana/energy to play cards from your hand. Beware, your opponent is also collecting tiles in their turn and could be grabbing that colour match you were waiting for.

Reach the end of a run to unlock the gallery of that character and play with her using your "special" cards.

name: Artifacting
description: Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of excavations, artifacts and relics in a cozy and dark match 3 game - Artifacting!

name: Suzy Burger
description: Welcome to Suzy Burger. Wear gloves and get ready to serve customers.

name: Arbeit Man in another world
description: Limited time maze adventure game

name: Cake Invaders
description: The Japanese just love their famous German-inspired Baumkuchen cakes, and hungry invaders from across the universe have discovered these delicious treats too! Are you up to the challenge of protecting the precious desserts from waves of alien attacks? Save the cakes!!

name: Tree Strike
description: The incremental tree striking platformer, strike trees, collect them, die and make the numbers go up.

name: Another Eye
description: Another EYE is where your intelligence will help you escape from the creatures in the different locations, but you have an ability that by eating one eye you can see with the eyes of the creatures that are chasing you, by breaking 10 statues you can get out of there. can you do it?

name: Find All
description: A game to find cute cats, raccoons and dogs in the city. Find all the hidden objects in a small black and white city by coloring it along the way. Game for all ages.

name: 铁血攻沙
description: Sin descripción

name: 80s Volleyball
description: Welcome back to the 80s and this is 80s Volleyball a game based on 8bits 80s volleyball videogames, choose between 32 80s teams, compete in 8 80s tournaments or play in Season mode where you start at 1977 and try to qualify to major tournaments until the year of 1988.

name: Bonhomme 7 Heures
description: An exploration horror game set in a typical 1850 house which revolve around the myth of Bonhomme 7 Heures, an urban legend from Quebec.

name: Cuboid Bouncer
description: Cuboid Bouncer is a 3D Side-Scroller video game that includes 12 levels with different challenges on each level. The player is called Cuboid (a cube like character) that must jump or bounce its way through the different obstacles.

name: Sisyphus
description: After an eternity of toiling away at meaningless divine punishment, Sisyphus has finally snapped. Join Sisyphus in his quest for revenge as he weaponizes the very rock chaining him down to steamroll and swing his way to the top of Mount Olympus, while breaking a few laws of physics along the way.

name: Draco Space X
description: 2D Arcade space action game, in which you will face different challenges. You must manage to kill your enemies or survive from them! Venture to discover a new universe full of lights!

name: Bondage Black Jack
description: 4 female blackjack players are not satisfied with their tournament results. They will be lucky enough to meet a bondage master.

name: Hentai Killer: Girls & Chess
description: Game in which you have to assemble your beautiful team of girls and put them on the battlefield in a strategic autobattler.

name: Tantei Jinguuji Saburou: Fukushuu no Rondo
description:
The 16th installment in the Jake Hunter series, as well as the 25th anniversary.

The story starts with Jinguuji waking up, only to find himself bound and being used as a punching bag by some gangsters. They seem to want information about a certain something from Jinguuji (and they also seem to have a personal grudge against him), though he honestly has no idea what they're talking about. Jinguuji manages to escape, only to discover that the police found the dead body of an ex-client of him in the trunk of his car, making him the prime suspect in the murder case. Chased by both the gangsters and the police now, the Shinjuku detective has to clear his name and find out what happened.

name: Dream Drifters
description:
You've entered a deep dream taking you into the Dreamscape and infinite realm for you to explore. As you drift you'll encounter Nightmares that will try to end your dreams so be sure to dodge them. How deep can you travel?

In this casual infinite runner, you'll drift through an infinite path and dodge incoming enemies. Take a step back from being awake and drift for a while.

name: Aviano
description: Aviano is an exploration game from other worlds, where the player plays an archaeologist who wants to solve a mystery! And it will take him to fly with his hang glider in other ways, challenging your pilot skills until the end of each level. The controls are easy to understand but skill based, the physics-based flight model. It offers a realistic flight experience, similar to a real flying wing, am with higher speeds to entertain and give speed sensations to the player…

name: Mi'pu'mi' Collection
description:
The Flower Collectors

Barcelona, 1977. An ex-cop in a wheelchair witnesses a murder, and teams up with a young ambitious journalist to bring the truth to light. With camera, binoculars and transmitter in hand, uncover the town’s secrets from your balcony in this soul-searching detective mystery.

The Lion's Song

The Lion’s Song is a narrative adventure game. It is set against the backdrop of early 20th century Austria with every episode following a different character.

The Lion's Song is a series of four self-contained point & click stories connected into an overarching narrative, where player choices will affect the way in which the story unfolds. Set against the backdrop of early 20th century Austria, every episode follows a different character, each blessed with an exceptional creative mind. The game pulls players into a story of personal struggle for creativity, human connections and inspiration.

name: Cock-A-Doodle-Doo
description: Cock-A-Doodle-Doo is an indie game made with RPG Tsukuuru Super Dante and released for the Satellaview as a stand-alone game. The player controls a chicken in a medieval fantasy world.

name: Jewel of Live
description: Jewel of Live is a game made with RPG Tsukuuru Super Dante and released for the Satellaview as a stand-alone game. This is the first game in the Jewel of Live series.

name: Jewel of Live II
description: Jewel of Live is a game made with RPG Tsukuuru Super Dante and released for the Satellaview as a stand-alone game. It is the second in the Jewel of Live series.

name: Umatarou Gennarin Daibouken
description: Umatarou Gennarin Daibouken is a game made with RPG Tsukuuru Super Dante and released for the Satellaview as a stand-alone game.

name: Sugoi RPG
description: Sugoi RPG is a game made with RPG Tsukuuru Super Dante and released for the Satellaview as a stand-alone game. It is the first in the Sugoi RPG series.

name: SatellaWalker: Satebo wo Sukuidase!
description: SatellaWalker: Satebo wo Sukuidase! is the first part of SatellaWalker, released for the Satellaview, with SoundLink support.

name: SatellaWalker: Machi no Heiwa wo Torimodose!
description: SatellaWalker: Machi no Heiwa wo Torimodose! is the second part of SatellaWalker, released for the Satellaview in 1997.

name: SatellaWalker 2: Moku-moku Kemuri Panic
description: SatellaWalker 2: Moku-moku Kemuri Panic is the first part of SatellaWalker 2, released in 1998 for the Satellaview, with SoundLink support.

name: SatellaWalker 2: Bottom de Battle
description: SatellaWalker 2: Bottom de Battle is the second part of SatellaWalker 2, released for the Satellaview in 1998, with SoundLink support.

name: Conspiracy!
description: Conspiracy! is a detective game that takes you on a journey into the heart of the Deep State.

name: Takara-hai Oozumou Eisei Basho
description: Takara-hai Oozumou Eisei Basho is a port of Oozumou Tamashii for the Satellaview which had SoundLink support. It is a sumo fighting game, which was accompanied by a live broadcast. The gameplay is divided into two parts; the player does the training in the first half, while real matches begin in the second half. Scores are counted according to the kinds of used techniques. A voice guide is provided by Kiyoko Taniguchi.

name: Survive! Mola mola!
description:
The "closest animal to heaven" has arrived!!
Take care of your mola! Brand-new nurturing game where "death=pleasure"
Molas are pretty distinct with a large and oddly-shaped body.
However, they are actually very delicate. The smallest thing can make them die.

【Cause of death】
Dive into the deep-end too quickly
→Wow, the water is so cold!
→Death

Sun bathing
→When I woke up, I was on land
→Death

Jump to kill a parasites riding on the body
→Fell and struck the water!
→Death

Don't let your mola die. Grow your mola to the world's biggest 2.5t class!

name: You Are a Whale Part 1
description: You Are A Whale Also Part 1 is the spiritual successor to You Are A Whale. Become a whale, live the life of the mighty being in a very serious absolutely realistic game is definitely meant to simulate what actual whale life is like. Whales.

name: Centipede
description: The Game Boy port of the 1981 original has features enhancements for the Super Game Boy.

name: Global Pokédex Plus
description: Sin descripción

name: Paro Paro
description: A Free Doujin parody/fangame of the parodius series of shmups.

name: Anima: The Reign of Darkness
description: Anima is an action RPG (hack'n slash) videogame inspired by the greatest old school games

name: Jurassic Hunter
description: Jurassic Hunter was an arcade first person shooter for mobile phones. In the game, the player would take control of three beautiful women hunting dinosaurs in the wild. Released in 2014, Jurassic Hunter was removed from the App Store and Google Play Store in 2015.

name: Rising Noracam
description: Climb the ruins to get the legendary treasure that is at the top. The control is very simple, but one mistake will cause you to fall and keep falling. Game of that type

name: Toricky S
description: Toricky-S is the switch version of the old-school Action-Adventure game featuring unique mechanics based on fast-flying and physics.

name: Marooned
description:
I'm Ed Stafford. I used to walk through the Amazon and survived on a desert island.Now I set myself in a new challenge.To prove I can make it in some of the world.

In the game, players play role of Ed and survive in different environment of the world, such as Thailand Jungle, Philippine island,African Plain and etc. You will have no tools, no clothes, no food, no water, and not even a knife.Despite such condition, dogged Ed can still overcome the harsh environment and live well.

developers.name: Shaoxing Kuaifei Network Technology Co., Ltd

name: Super Zangyura
description: An incredible evil threatens the world once again!

name: Hyper Treasure: The Legend of Macaron
description: A Point & Click adventure game with action scenes, movies, QTE and scary monsters / Find the truth among the multiple endings (It looks like this, but it's a precisely made game)

name: Air Hoppers 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeon Attack
description: Monotonous leveling, long quests, difficult mystery solving. Dungeon Attack is a party-building roguelike RPG that eliminates all the hassle of such RPGs and just builds a party and fights in a short time is born here! The game will continue to fight on the automatically generated map and strengthen the party. Have a good dungeon life!

name: One Punch
description: This is Action Music Game. You can beat enemies with music.

name: Doll Explorer Prologue
description: "Doll Explorer Prologue" you can play a free thinking puzzle game where you choose commands such as "move forward" or "attack" to traverse a dungeon! In search of dungeon treasures, the adventures of apprentice witch Tia and her magical life form Doll begin!

name: Six F and Six 0
description: A 2D action game that explores and adventures in the black and white world The hero is somewhere in this world full of strange creatures Aim to destroy jewels and obtain archives.

name: Deco: Block Simulator
description: Simple block play. There are no battles, puzzles, or items to collect in this game. All you can do is play with blocks. There is no story, setting, or background. You can only play with blocks.

name: Eclipse Horde
description: "Craft or die" It's up to you to decide. The solar eclipse will come 30 days later. Can you survive the raid of the day? The sandbox and survival crafting game where you can do everything you want.

name: Don't Stop Corocco
description: Sin descripción

name: Polychoron
description: Polychoron is a simple but challenging 3D shoot'em up in zero gravity environment in series of unique mazes. The objective is to take out hostile drones guarding the maze, collect score and power-ups and reach the next maze alive. Those who reach the highest levels and collect most score before the inevitable death get their names on the global high score table.

name: Palworld
description: Palworld is a brand-new, multiplayer, open-world survival crafting game where you can befriend and collect mysterious creatures called "Pal" in a vast world! Make your Pals fight, build, farm, and work in factories.

name: Ou
description:
"Between somewhere and someone."
U-chronia is a mysterious world constantly changing like a book whose pages are flipped out of order. You will wear the shoes of OU, the protagonist, to live through this game-shaped experience—without knowing what it really is.

name: Guri-guri Europe
description: Learn about Europe in this mobile game!

name: Fight of Animals: Arena
description: Meme animals strike again!! Let the meme battle goes into NEXT LEVEL!! With varied stages, items and support up to 4 players local and online, “Fight of Animals: Arena” will bring you a brand new Brawler experience!! Let the fight begin!!

name: Relaxing Rain Sounds: Amayadori
description:
Amayadori is an idle game where you watch rain fall in the countryside.

Listening to the rain can help you forget your worries and relax when you'd like to sleep, meditate, focus, or study.

Unlock mini visual novel scenes by spending the points you've earned while idling.

name: Steam Puppet: Tower Defense
description:
Let's destroy the enemy's barrier in online battles!

Organize troops with different abilities, destroy the barriers built with blocks and invade them!

Steam Puppet is an online real-time strategy game that you attack enemies and defend attacks from enemies.

Enemies will attack you when you're offline (the app isn't running), so build walls to prevent them from being easily invaded and go see them from time to time.

name: Hannya Bullet Hell
description:
Strengthen your character and defeat enemies!
It is a bullet hell shmup that combines casualness and authenticity.

name: Cleaning Robot Match: Scatter Battlers
description: They scatter, they throw, they smash each other! A game cleaning robots! "Scatter Battlers" is a shooting battle game in which cleaning robots pick up trash and non-trash objects and throw them at each other. Also, there's a co-op mode.

name: Grow: Song of the Evertree
description: Grow your own worlds and nurture a deep natural connection with everything they hold. See your actions change the world for better! Bring the Evertree back to life in this breathtaking world-crafting sandbox, with life management and adventure elements.

name: 3D Chess: Nocca Nocca
description:
An easy-to-learn, quick-to-play abstract game containing 5 black and 5 white dice. The board is simply a 5×8 grid. All five white and black dice begin the game on their respective sides. You can win the game one of two ways:

Move one die of your color to the opponents goal (This area is behind the starting line)
Have all five of your dice on top of the other opponents.
On your turn you must move one of your dice to any orthagonal or diagonal space adjacent to this die. You may move your die on top of one or two (stacked dice). This means you will then create a stack of two or three, unless the space was empty. You may not create a stack of four. You can also move your cube on top of any stack to an adjacent space.

It takes 5-10 minutes per game, but the moves demand much attention and cleverness.

name: Slash of Bullet
description: An exhilarating VR game with a new sensation where you take down many enemy robots with sword slashes.

name: Craft the Mapcrafter: Gathering Magic Words
description: An RPG where you gather words while travelling in a fantasy world.

name: CosmoDreamer
description: From the popular free game "Outside" comes a dreamy and cute barrage shmups. The visuals are colorful, cute and fantastic, and the game features active gameplay.

name: Sunny Fairy
description:
In this story-driven RPG, you control a fairy protagonist.
Explore maps, win battles, and advance the story.

No language is used in the game.
Please enjoy as you let your imagination take over.

name: Doradora Panic
description:
This is a mini action game in which a roadie fixes a drum set.
The drum set has been haunted by a ghost !? Operate Mr. Roadie to fix troubles that occur one after another on the drum set. Let's help Mr. drummer play the drum for a long time!

name: Obsessive Love Adventure Utsuro's Diary
description: The main character Hataro has a popular girlfriend called Utsuro who decides to one day starts a dairy exchange. The project soon turns into a hellish nightmare...

name: Cube Clones
description:
A 3D block puzzle with a beautiful world view that makes full use of "clone".
Immerse yourself in a fantastic world and immerse yourself in elaborate puzzles.

name: No toilet paper!!
description:
Is this happen to you?
When you go to the toilet, and there’s no toilet paper...
That kinds helpless ,sadness feelings...or even just put on your pants without wipe your butt after all...
Hey...don’t give up so quick...here comes our savior!!

Now grab the toilet paper and help the people on toilet together.

name: Touhou Fan-made Virtual Autography
description: Dichromatic balls suddenly showed themselves in Gensokyo and gained immense popularity! Did you think this was going to be another JRPG or location-based game? No, this is a bullet hell game! Start your journey full of dreams and adventures, and be ready for the original characters!

name: Choju Yokai Giga
description: The mysterious Yokai Monogatari has been opened, unleashing Yokai into the world! Help Miko seal them away and restore peace to the village. Build your deck and summon animals to defeat Yokai in this side-scrolling platformer! The longer you go without touching the ground, the more cards you will receive when you finally land. Play cards to summon animals with different effects, and collect sake to keep them on the field. Since Miko can't do any direct damage, be smart about where to place the summoned animals!

name: The Chewllers
description: The Chewllers is an online, multiplayer, VR game. The project presents stylized and comic nature, where 4 players protect the tower from monsters in Co-op mode.

name: QuietMansion1
description: QuietMansion1 is a horror escape game only released in Japan (in 2018). It was originally called KENGOHAZARD.

name: Space Cats Tactics
description: Fight nerve-wracking spaceship battles in this turn-based tactical space opera RPG! Manage your crew of feline warriors to adapt to every strategic situation and dive into a thrilling space opera story where your choices will determine your path.

name: W.T.
description: "Perfect" is possible only for those who know mathematics. When you open your eyes, you are alone in a white room. In a mansion dominated by the mysteries of numbers. Solve the presented math puzzles and aim for the exit.

name: Murder on the Marine Express
description: Murder on the Marine Express is a visual novel game and the first installment of The Mysteries of Ranko Togawa series.

name: Menherafflesia Flowering Abyss
description:
"Open your eyes. You can see the beautiful sky, right?"

As Itarou spends his monotonic days, he unknowingly gets lost in a poisonous flower garden. Let's make the colorful flowers bloom here now...

"Menherafflesia Flowering Abyss" is an ADV game where you choose one of five types of flowers to capture the menhera heroines.

name: Exp!A
description: Create a wonderful amusement park with the innocent boy Ash. Tell him the idea you came up with and Ash will build an amusement park based on that idea. You may be asked for a lot of EXP when you make something or make friends with someone. But there are many more EXPs. rest assured. Welcome to the other side of the end roll. This is a story to give to "you" who was once the main character.

name: The Legend of Tianding
description: The Legend of Tianding is a sidescrolling action game about Liao Tianding, the legendary Taiwanese Folk Hero. Explore the dazzling streets of Colonial Japanese Taiwan in the early 20th century, as you rob the rich, feed the poor, and expose the darkness lurking in the heart of Taipei.

name: The Longing Ribbon
description: You and two friends find yourselves lost in the woods one day and decide to seek refuge in a nearby mansion. Certainly nothing could go wrong; people do that sort of thing all the time, don't they? But what you are about to discover is that this is no ordinary mansion, and its inhabitants are no ordinary people...

name: Hakuda's Wife Visiting
description:
What Kinu, a girl who woke up in the dim room found was a letter.

[The mountain god disguises as a human and knock on the door. It is said that the true form is somewhat strange-looking. Once you provoke the mountain god, the river will be swallowed, the mountain will be destroyed, the sky will be concealed, by the act of the mountain god. Never, ever make the mountain god angry.]

….Then there was a sound of knocking on the door.

name: The Count of Monte Carlo
description:
The game is Blackjack, but not as you know it. The wager is your life, but you do not plan to lose it.

Beat the house and double down on the double-dealers who sealed you away. Experience a twist on both a classic card game and a classic novel.

name: Ikusaaaaaaan!
description: Play as Iku Nagae in this combination of shoot'em up and rhythm game!

name: Dark Seeker
description: This is a 3D dungeon RPG filled with unique characters and monsters by the solo developer kemuri.

name: Wizardry: The Five Ordeals
description: Old-school dungeon crawler is here ! This game is most old-school style of "Wizardry" spiritual successor, which gave origin of JRPGs, is now available on Steam with scenario editor and some modern UI improvements.

name: The Knight of Nephiart
description: The Knight of Nephiart sees players leading a party in an adventure to take on a great evil. The game features a first-person perspective and turn-based combat.

name: iii: Revolving Wonderland
description: iii: Revolving Wonderland is an RPG by a sole developer using pixel art, 3D & live 2D. Explore a broken world “full of happiness” and hear out people’s wishes as you seek the truth. Will the world end up fixed, destroyed, or...? It’s up to you.

name: My Child New Beginnings
description: My Child New Beginnings is a life simulation game where you play as an adoptive parent to a child with a dramatic past. The game is a sequel to My Child Lebensborn and combines philosophy, trauma, care and reconciliation as the main topics. There will also be a simple online function that lets other people share thoughts about these topics.

name: Strainge
description:
We are about to reach our destination. It's been a long and tiring day, we can't wait to get home and finish with it... but something so simple can get unexpectedly complicated.

Solve the mystery surrounding this train on one of the strangest public transport trips you've ever experienced.

Don't forget to buy a ticket, the train is leaving in a couple of minutes...

name: To Duel List
description: A teenager angry with the world, a list of tasks... accompany him on what seems like a totally normal day: visit different beautiful and colorful scenarios, solve puzzles, meet his picturesque family... although not everything will always be as beautiful as it seems.

name: Wonderland Nights: White Rabbit's Diary
description: Play as the White Rabbit in a schedule-based visual novel game set in the world of Alice in Wonderland.

name: Neon Baller 0.1
description: Neon Baller 0.1 is a continuation of an experiment in physics based 3D platforming with improvements to audio, visual, and controls.

name: Eden.schemata();
description: EDEN.schemata(); is a multi-ending sci-fi mystery adventure game, featuring headless corpses, a sealed laboratory, a limbless android suspect/heroine, and an amnesiac protagonist. The game design and gradually UI change in reflection of your actions.

name: Its Been a While Since I Went for a Walk
description: Relaxing exploration game made for the January 2021 Bitsy Jam.

name: Loose Lips(Side:foggy)
description: Sin descripción

name: Kanji Searcher
description: Sin descripción

name: Sengoku Block Bashi
description:
Experience the battles of Japan's Warring States period!

Defeat famous samurai from all over Japan and aim to unite the country while enjoying a loose conversation with the ditzy character Zy in Samurai Brick Breaker.

Enjoy the story told by Zy and the ending that comes after clearing the hard mode.

name: Bellumarot
description: This is a puzzle game that looks like an old-school card game, but it's actually quite different and unique.

name: Entertainment Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Double Jump 2
description: A 2D platformer in which the number of jumps the player has is doubled after each completed level.

name: Hack FPS
description: Hack FPS is a First Person Shooter (obviously). Your objective is to hack enemies and use their abilities to get to the end of the level. Find out about your origins, and escape from the looming threat that plans to terminate you.

name: The Crystal Rainforest
description: The game takes place on the planet Oglo. In the kingdom of Azon, the last remaining rainforest is being cut down by the antagonistic "Cut and Run Gang". The king of Azon ordered the Cut and Run Gang to stop threatening the rainforest, and is shortly shot by a poison dart. The two protagonists must take part in a variety of settings and activities to retrieve the magical rainforest crystals to save the king and stop the deforestation of the planet.

name: Spirit Cleaning
description:
Spirit Cleaning is an action/visual novel hybrid game where you play as The Cleaner, a spring cleaner visiting a residential house in the suburbs.

However, this job isn't a normal one—each room of the house is haunted by the tragedies that befell its many residents and their bloodied crime scenes.

And they're all anime girls.

name: Zombieeee!
description: This is a fun action game where a cute girl fights her enemies with a big variation of combos.

name: MagiCraze
description: Sin descripción

name: Hello, Goodbye, Summer Girl
description: Pixel Art & Yuri & Cinema! The story of a Bad Girl in Miami and a JK from Tokyo. A Girl meets Girl Entertainment Crime Thriller.

name: Rystel
description: A 2D action-adventure through a world in soft pixel art. The brilliance of the star crystal "Rystel" is being lost. Let the adventure begin to uncover the mysteries!

name: Deep Dark Forest
description: 一款不同于传统的RTS策略游戏。将科幻作品《三体》中的“黑暗森林法则与RTS的玩法相融合，带来了独特的的体验。你将要领导文明，发展经济，提升科技，稳定民心，殖民新星系；在遭遇未知文明时，是隐藏好自己，还是友好沟通？在这个“黑暗森林”中如何生存下去，每个决定都将至关重要。

name: Re:Kuroi
description: Follow the bullied boy Kaito along in this adventure RPG as he battles various magical creatures.

name: Momibosu
description: A boy and a girl, who have a mysterious weapon, a drone, set out on an adventurous journey from their small underground village to the vast world, aiming for a new world. Enjoy "Momibosu," a high-tempo road movie-like 2D action game that will make you want to play over again and again.

name: Bigroom Escape
description: Sin descripción

name: Aznana
description: Aznana is an idle adventure game developed by Caramel Column for mobile. Every villager has a music box or a sunflower head, except our protagonist. One day, he picked up a head named AZNANA and became friends with it. Players need to save their money, and getaway from the boring town they live in.

name: Zero Hour
description: A game made in 2009 and released in 2021 in itch.io's Indie Bundle for Palestinian Aid.

name: Spiritle
description: Spiritle is a turn-based strategic battle digital board game. You incarnate a Spirit among the 4 elements: Nature, Earth, Water and Fire. At the rhythm of the 4 seasons, the fallen Spirits challenge each other to regain their place in the World Tree.

name: Operation Steel
description: Operation Steel is a roguelike shoot-em-up rendered in beautiful hand-drawn art. Blow up loads of enemies, destroy huge bosses, find weapons, and upgrade your load-out between levels. Combat the electronic legion across 20+ procedurally generated levels!

name: Understanding of the Abyss
description:
"Understanding of the Abyss" is a 3D horror game based on the Cthulhu Mythos.
The goal of the game is to provide a still madness.

name: Mindhack
description: "Mindhack" is a text adventure game that turns the villain's head into a flower garden.

name: Black Cat Explores Minds
description: The game is about a black cat walking in a maze.

name: The Hundred Year Kingdom
description: Create a world free of conflict in this innovative turn-based simulation. Work together with a mythical young goddess to develop a peaceful civilization over the course of a century.

name: Immortal Life
description: Immortal Life is a beautiful single-player management game where you play as a member of a cultivation sect. Fleeing the destruction of your community, you discover a breathtaking valley where a young community welcomes you with open arms. You set yourself to work relentlessly, decided to help your new brothers and sisters make this settlement grow and flourish into a prosperous village.

name: BattleSound
description: BattleSound is rhythmical battle game by the developer Skeyll.

name: Tale of Jade Li Guang
description: Tale of Jade Li Guang is a stand-alone roguelike card game with oriental elements. Gameplay involves constructing your own deck by 5 elements cards, exploring the map, solving random encounters, beating the demon and uncovering the mystery of Li Guang's Kingdom.

name: Magical Blaster
description: With these fairies, shoot your way through this high speed shooting game!

name: Hamster Panic
description: Protect your candy house from the hamsters!

name: Smash Crabs
description: Sin descripción

name: Blobbins
description: Try to save as many Blobbins as you can while exploring a dark and hostile environment.

name: DriveCrazy
description:
The player is being pursued by someone.
You can go through the first floor of a building, jump from building to building, run through the walls of a building, and Runaway from the enemy by destroying streetlights and trees.

name: Extreme QTE
description: Sin descripción

name: Daibutsu Paradise
description: Sin descripción

name: Monmusu Gladiator
description: Monster girls to fight for liberty.

name: Unkore
description: Battle enemies, talk to cute anime girls, tell them all about the size, shape and color of your poop!

name: Lesbian Mothman Hunters
description:
A short visual novel made in around a month for Cryptid Jam.

Guide the skeptical Charlie through a night in her local woods, helping her cute friend Mia search for the infamous Mothman (or, possibly, the less-infamous Owlman. Mia insists that the difference is academic).

name: The Visitor
description:
Gather round, kids, it's time for some
story-telling. You got the lights off and curtains down?
Then let's start.

Let's go back in time, to the year 1913.
We're going to follow the story of a normal,
but yet not so normal family.
It all started when the family inherited
a big mansion from the mothers
now deceased uncle.

They weren't rich by any means, but they also inherited
quite a bit of money.
So they thought: "Wow, living in a mansion,
let's try it out!"
Ah, the young and foolish.
Would there be any stories to tell without them?

Alright kids, let grandma Agatha guide
you through this night of horror.
You like scary stories, don't you?
Because if you don't...
Shoo! Go away!

name: The Soldat with Twin Arms
description: Sin descripción

name: Bear's Restaurant
description:
What will you have for your last meal?

In this restaurant, the dead will have their last supper. Hamburgers, omelets, sushi, pudding, anything. Let us cook your favorite dish when you were alive.

name: Ultra Ninja Soul
description: Ultra Ninja Soul is an orthodox platformer. The player's goal is to control the main character, a ninja, and rescue a princess who has been kidnapped by youkai. The player collects sealed cards of ninjutsu from treasure chests along the way and uses a variety of attacks to conquer the stage.

name: Link: The Unleashed Nexus - Restructured Heaven
description:
Aim for the sky.
It doesn't matter if you don't have any wings.

name: Minesweeper Run
description:
Minesweeper meets an endless runner!

A dangerous run game that takes you through a minefield! Exploding mines will stop the time, so find a way through!

name: Live in Dungeon
description: Live in Dungeon is a RPG which get into a steamer-adventurer in isekai. Let’s stream dungeon crawl with the cat, and get many “Like”s!

name: Puzzzeni Easy
description: Sin descripción

name: Feeding My Fish: Make Aquarium
description:
This is a healing game where you can enjoy growing fish and coral in a beautiful aquarium.
It's a game about growing fish and growing coral in a beautiful aquarium.
There are cute fish such as the southern boxfish and clownfish, as well as unusual fish such as the butterflyfish.

name: Conet
description:
"Conet" is an extremely simple one-on-one strategy game of dots and boxes.

Black is the first player and white is the second player.
Clicking the square dots will connect them with lines to any other adjacent square dots that have already been clicked, scoring you one point for each line formed.
Both players take in turns clicking the square dots until they have all been clicked, and the player with the most points wins!
The special "lonely points" rule also means that any square dots that have not been connected to any others are worth three points each.

name: If You're a Ghost Call me Here!
description: If You're a Ghost Call me Here! is an adventure where the player must instantly judge the content of multiple conversations that are displayed on the screen at the same time, and continue to make the right choices in order to connect combos!

name: Rainbow Sea
description: Rainbow Sea is a somewhat disquieting pixel-arts adventure with attractive character designs of the Seven Lucky Gods. There are more than 100 different events and 22 endings.

name: Shape of Stars
description:
This is a story of stars and constellations for you and me.

In the world where all the constellations are lost, you need to collect stars to bring back the constellations in the night sky.

name: DarkBlood Reborn
description: DarkBlood is a turn-based roguelite RPG in which an immortal man with the blood of a demon king travels through dungeons and defeats vicious monsters. Simple, straightforward gameplay and profound strategy. Sigh-inducingly beautiful dot graphics await you.

name: Umurangi Generation: Special Edition
description: Umurangi Generation is a first person photography game in the retro future. Set in Tauranga Aotearoa off the back of an impending crisis you are a courier for the Tauranga Express. Throughout the game you will unlock a variety of lenses and equipment.

name: Crazy! Laundry Game: Don't Hit Mom With Dangerous
description:
Throw ridiculous things into the washer!
A crazy laundry game that makes you relax!

name: Butou Soujin
description: Sin descripción

name: Musubareta Te
description:
In the director's office of the Momoyama Academy, there's an altar with 3 kokeshi dolls that under no circumstances should be touched.

One night, two girls called Shizune and Akari end up trapped inside the school. There, they discover that the dolls have disappeared and when looking for a way out, they find a strange apparition. Could this be related to the wooden dolls?

name: Online Sparkler
description: Online sparkler is a game to share "the time to look at the same fire". Enjoy the communication between you and someone else through the sparklers, which light up differently depending on the weather at that moment!

name: The Luffeltera Renovator
description: The Luffeltera Renovator is a repair craft simulation game that completes a large-scale repair of the magic tower of the forest (commonly known as the light blue tower). Regain the brilliance of the decaying magic tower! Collect and craft materials! Sell it, fix it, and cultivate it! Let's complete a large-scale renovation once every 100 years with our friends!

name: Cat Dog Adventure Casual RPG
description:
A simple system that makes it easy to become stronger!
Easy operation with command battle!
Make your favorite team with cute cats!
Let's enjoy playing this game in your free time!

Cats have a big adventure in a loose world!

name: Maou Monogatari
description:
After 5 years of development, it's finally here!
Control up to 100 units in battles that are packed with dialogue from all your lovely monster girls!

Our hero was whisked away to another world and given a simple power:
the ability to revive no matter how many times he gets defeated.
Other than that, he's got only his wits and his allies to rely on as he fights to overcome all obstacles.

No leveling, no grinding, just stress-free SLG goodness.

name: Arrow Battle Online
description:
Ten players shoot arrows at the same time in an online battle!
Can you survive to the end as the arrows rain down on you?

Take advantage of your opponents' gaps and attack while avoiding the large number of arrows pouring down on you!
It's simple to use, but you can enjoy deep battles by timing your attacks, managing your stamina, and shooting arrows to drive your opponent back to the wall!
In addition to archers, there are other types of soldiers such as shield soldiers, and the key to victory is to cooperate with each other "loosely".

The key to victory is to cooperate with each other "loosely". In online battles, rates are added according to your contribution to victory.
Let's aim for the highest title [S] class, and even higher!

There are also hundreds of avatars to change your appearance.
There are hundreds of avatars to choose from, and you can combine them to create your own original character!

name: Ike Ike! Sorena-chan! Shooting Star!
description: Sin descripción

name: Neneko Neko Hako Neko Puzzle Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Boukensha Guild he Youkoso!
description: Sin descripción

name: Online Yuki Gassen DX
description: A game about snowball fighting with your friends!

name: Guru-guru Card Battle
description:
This is a casual card game that can be easily played in about 30 minutes.
The number of cards in the deck is HP, so try not to draw too many cards.

name: Zoeti
description: Zoeti is a card Battler game that combines Roguelike and poker. The Zoeti is a fantasy medieval world full of tarot cards, stars, souls, and magic. The art will be presented in bright and delicate hand-painted style.

name: Itsutsu no Neito
description: A free single-player RPG that you can enjoy from start to finish! A hearty story with an in -depth battle system!

name: SeekBlade
description: SeekBlade is a dungeon explorer action game for your phone!

name: Our After School Playzone
description:
All kinds of excitement awaits you around the town!
Choose 1 of the 8 unique characters and it's game on! Challenge your friends with games like Penalty Shootout, RC Racing, and Squirt Gun Battle! Even playing solo, you won't run out of things to do! Complete all sorts of missions to add to your Coin Collection! Try out a new strategy to get your highest score yet!

name: The Use of Life
description: The Use of Life is a “game book”-style multi-ending JRPG. The main character’s various “attachments” fluctuate in accordance with the choices the player makes, and the ending changes depending on “the use of life” you choose through your journey.

name: Hisou Ningyou
description:
When she awoke, she was in an unfamiliar mansion.
The girl searches for her lost memories.
When she discovers the truth, will she choose the path ahead of her, or darkness?

name: Elderand
description: Experience a Lovecraftian inspired story-driven action RPG game with skill-based combat. Explore and Fight in a dreadful world rich in treasures and deadly creatures. Elderand is a love letter to Castlevania with modern elements. Make your own path as you unveil the darkness.

name: El Paso, Elsewhere
description: Fight werewolves and vampires in a reality-shifting motel. Dive through barricades to escape the grasp of evil puppets. Destroy the villain you loved. A new, third-person love letter to classic shooters. Neo-noir never looked so good.

name: Run Die Run Again
description:
Run Die Run Again (RDRA) is a fast-paced first-person precision platformer, where every inch of the environment is out to kill you! A speed-running, trial and error endurance contest, where fast reactions and acrobatic dodging skills are rewarded.

Speed through stunning sci-fi obstacle courses; executing death-defying leaps, flips and dashes past deadly hazards and skirting certain-death, all with a ticking time-bomb strapped to your back! A precision platformer built for speed freaks who want their hardcore platformers in first-person.

name: Thin Walls
description: Iki had lost her voice due to previous events and thus only speaks internally. She wakes to find herself alone in her home with only the comforting voice named -Lo who resides in the walls of her home. A thunderstorm rages outside her window and seems to create strange objects in her home. She may unravel the events that caused her trauma or let them consume her, all the while being pursued by a dark faced, yet familiar stranger.

name: Necromance-chan
description: Sin descripción

name: Koromu Auto Battler
description: Along your journey across 12 constellations of the Galaxy Empire, you will fight your way out with 12 alien goddesses, until revealing the sacred mystery of Koromu, a long-lost book of predictions for human destiny!

name: Dearend
description: A cinematic action game by Kurosawa Create.

name: Buddha Go
description: Buddha GO is a new 1 vs 1 racing game in development using Unity by the Japanese studio ksym.

name: Opus: Echo of Starsong
description: Echo of Starsong is a Narrative puzzle adventure game. Eda, a girl who can hear mysterious sound waves known as starsong, crosses paths with a young man in search of their source. Together, they venture out to the heart of space to unravel an ancient myth.

name: Nana Iro Irony
description: Sin descripción

name: Universal Enemies
description: Join Riana and her team to stop a conspiracy of monsters that have gone berserk. A depth-scrolling action shooter with lots of characters and monsters!

name: Ruki no Zetsubo
description: Ruki Kashima, a 8 years old boy, is home alone when, due to a storm, his house is affected by a blackout. Ruki panics, but not only because he's afraid of the dark... but also because of that doll that his father keeps and that Ruki believes is cursed.

name: Brave's Rage
description: "Brave's Rage" is a challenging real-time strategy card game. You can build your own unique deck and team, flexibly use bullet time and perfect defense mechanism, defeat the enemy elegantly and efficiently !

name: The Barren Babel
description: Sin descripción

name: Half-Baked Girls
description: Follow the adventures of two young girls as they explore a mysterious haunted mansion in Half-Baked Girls, a 3D indie role-playing game.

name: Re:Take
description: "Re:TAKE" is the latest fantasy 2D side scrolling combat game! Upgrade your favorite characters, collect rare items that allow you to unlock special skills and spells, get monsters as pets, and join your friends to defeat the hordes of enemies and numerous giant bosses!

name: Mekururi Witch
description: Sin descripción

name: Katabasis: Monsters Arise
description: Sin descripción

name: Predator and Wreck
description: The game is set in a space station where an unexplained explosion suddenly occurs. Without being able to counterattack, you need to escape while solving a multitude of mysterious. Be careful to not be caught by the ferocious aliens!

name: Koumajou Remilia: Scarlet Symphony
description: Koumajou Remilia: Scarlet Symphony is an action side-scroller based on the world-famous Touhou Project. The legendary 2009 title comes back with modern upgrades including HD remastered graphics and a number of bonus content, ready to give fans more convenient and pleasant gameplay experience.

name: Tougenkyou
description:
Hidden Wonderland drew inspiration from The Peach Blossom Spring, a fable by the well-known Chinese poet Tao Yuanming. The game is set in the late Tang dynasty following the An Lushan Rebellion when the country was ravaged by competing warlords. To flee the war, civilians come to a valley to build a new home.
In the game, the player assumes the role of village head who sends villagers to gather resources, manages labor, grows the population, establishes a village for survival step by step, and gradually turns it into a paradise.

name: Sushi Alone
description: Your father is the only sushi chef around and one day he has to get hospitalized. Before he leaves for the hospital, he asks you to look after the restaurant. Now you have to run the sushi restaurant all on your own!

name: Escape from the Labyrinth
description:
When the girl woke up, she was at station on the sea.
She can’t remember why she is here——
The girl decided to find a way to go home,
where her family is waiting——

name: Makoto Wakaido's Case Files: Phantom's Foot
description:
This is the the third installment in the Makoto Wakaido series.
This mystery takes about an hour to solve and the actual culprit might surprise you!

name: Varvarion
description: Varvarion is a 3D sword fighting action game currently in development, which puts you at the center of playable, anime-styled sword fights. Flipping and dodging to evade ferocious attacks, parrying at the last possible split second to reposte with a deadly blow, and doing it all with the style and flare of an anime battle; this is what Varvarion is setting out to achieve.

name: RPGolf Legends
description:
Become the legend in this golf-action-adventure and save golf in the world!

RPGolf Legends is the follow-up title to RPGolf that launched on Android and iOS in 2017, and on PC via Steam in 2018. The game is an action RPG that has players go on a golfing adventure in a world full of monsters.

name: Ningyo Heart
description:
Ami and Mamoru are two childhood friends, until, one day, Mamoru starts suffering heart problems and ends up in a coma.
Miraculously, Mamoru manages to wake up, but to his surprise, his friend Ami is missing. Knowing that something bad is happening, he begins to investigate, and all the clues lead him to the "Dollmaker".

name: Idle Monsters
description: Abandoned RPG and monster combination! Let's master the mutation and heredity and grow the strongest monster! All battles and dungeon searches will proceed automatically. It is a game specialized for those who want to enjoy the game in their spare time. Incremental game x hack and slash x monster combination. An infinitely playable incremental game!

name: Familiars.io
