description: MMO monster taming game you can play directly in your browser!

name: Whitewater Wipeout
description: Crank it yo! Master the waves and hang ten in Whitewater Wipeout! This wave crashing, high score chasing, crank-tastic experience is inspired by the classic California Games. Experience surfing in an innovative new way while performing sick tricks using the Playdate's unique crank. Perform daring 360’', gnarly double 360s all while avoiding the shark. Will you rise in the ranks of the global leaderboards or fall prey to the wave?

name: Altheia: The Wrath of Aferi
description: Altheia: The Wrath of Aferi is a fantasy adventure game where a sword–wielding Guardian and an arcane Monk must learn to work together to defeat the Void corrupting their home. Explore ruined temples, solve environmental puzzles, rescue spirits, and defeat giant Void monsters!

name: Monsters
description: During a road trip on a hot summer night, a group of friends are stranded in the middle of a forest when their car crashes and breaks down, civilization many miles away. As they settle down for the night, they stumble across a young woman bound in to a tree. While they express concern at first, the situation quickly turns dark when one of the members encourages the others to take advantage of the situation and toy with her as they please. All but one are on board with the idea and the more he stands by and watches, the more he realizes what kind of darkness lies in the hearts of people who are given power. He slowly begins to reconsider who his allies and enemies really are, confronting his urge to turn against his friends for the sake of a complete stranger.

name: Haiki Gas Circle
description: Sin descripción

name: Reaper
description:
Death has always been her enemy.

After the death of their parents, she was left with only her sister as family. However, she is young and has a weak body. Her sister, though previously very healthy, somehow got something worse than her. She couldn't understand what the doctors said, but she understood that she must do everything she can to help her sister.

When Death comes to claim the only one she has left, she wasn't just going to sit quietly and let it happen.

name: Sin
description: Upon waking, Elm finds all his memories to be blank. A mysterious man known as Oak bestows a trial upon him, which Elm accepts upon the condition that his memories will be returned should he succeed. Numerous “Destinations” are left incomplete, their fragments scattered across the world. Elm’s past, Oak’s motive, and the mystery cloaking this world…what could they be?

name: Toraware no Shoujo: Bluebird of Happiness
description: Toraware no Shoujo – Bluebird of Happiness is a game heavily story-centered, with a short gameplay and graphics 100% custom made. It features 3 endings.

name: Red Book: Discordia Tales
description: Play as Alice as she tries to get out from the dark world by an unknown entity.

name: Shuuen ~Another World~
description: Shuuen ~Another World~ is a short Shuuen no Shiori fangame where you play as C-ta and need to find a way to get out of your school alive.

name: Running Askew
description: A short visual novel about running late.

name: Alone in the Grey
description: Alone in the Grey is an adventure puzzle game where the player must escape from a UFO they have mysteriously awoke in. Uncover clues and solve puzzles to escape and find out the reason for your capture. Hack terminals and find batteries to obtain freedom.

name: Releveler
description: Releveler is a traditional platformer where every level's end is also a new beginning.

name: Antiprism
description:
Test your aim and dodging abilities against elite enemies, unique bosses and environmental hazards, as you uncover the secrets of the Antiprism and its connection to the extinct civilization of Arn.
Collect items and credits from your encounters and use them to customize and upgrade parts of your ships - you will need all the firepower you can get in order to reach the end of our pilots' journey.

name: WGRealms: Demon Throne
description: WGRealms: Demon Throne is a standalone Duke Nukem 3D Total Conversion though the Eduke32 source port. A remake of WGRealms 2: Siege Breaker and sequel to WGRealms, It follows The Duke over 3 different realms with a dark fantasy/medieval theme and boasts 25 levels, 20 new enemies and 10 new bosses, as well as all new graphics, a whole arsenal of new weapons and two playable characters, Duke Nukem and Jedrik.

name: Dezaemon BS-X Version: Sugoi STG 2 - Crystal Guardian
description: Sugoi STG 2 - Crystal Guardian Is a game made using Dezaemon, released as a downloadable game for the Satellaview.

name: MiniRacingOnline
description: MiniRacingOnline is a multiplayer racing game in which you will be able to compete with players of any part of the world.

name: Mario Kart CW
description: Mario Kart CW is a rom hack for Mario Kart DS which re-implements removed and beta variants of tracks into the game.

name: Doubutsu Banchou
description:
Eat or be eaten! Assume the role of an animal in it's early stages of evolutionary development. As your animal instincts take over, you will boldly traverse hostile environments, savagely stalking your prey to assert your place in the animal chain of power. Will you have what it takes to become the new king of beasts?

The game started development on the Nintendo 64, but went unreleased, being later ported to the Nintendo GameCube. A prototype of the Nintendo 64 version has been found

name: Yars' Revenge
description: Yars' Revenge for Game Boy Color (full title: Yars' Revenge: the Qotile Ultimatum) is a port of the original 1981 Atari 2600 release, published by Telegames and developed by Vatical Entertaiment.

name: Long Journey Home
description:
Long Journey Home is an interactive fiction game about grief, friendship, and decomposers with two endings. Made in Twine. Music by @lunatunes.

Content Warnings: Death, Grief, Weird Mushroom Illness, the Void of Space

name: Kurenai no Tsuki
description: Sin descripción

name: Ai ga Mie Hajimetara
description: Sin descripción

name: Akai Suishou no Hitomi
description:
A mystery visual novel in which you play as a detective who works part time at a sports accessories store.

In a gym equipment room he discovers a hanging mummified corpse. According to victim's older sister Makoto, her brother was alive just a while ago. Together with Makoto you are to discover the truth behind this suspicious case.

name: Douri Hazure
description:
Miyo Tousotsu Kikou was once called a paradise where only happiness existed. It was the last resort for those who have taken a step outside of reason and justice. But with every passing moment, the place fell apart from its very foundation.

Facing misfortunes they never knew until now, most of its residents lost their sense of self to fear and confusion.

But amidst the chaos, a certain character came to realize that this outcome was fine. As long as the "two of them" were together, they would be fine no matter what happened to their surroundings.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 101: The Sentou
description: This is Japanese public bath, which is called Sentou, management simulation game developed by D3 Publisher Co., Ltd. in Japan.

name: Alfred Hitchcock: Vertigo
description:
Can you trust your own mind? In Alfred Hitchcock: Vertigo, dive into a new kind of psychological thriller, and walk on a thin line between reality and fantasy.

Live a powerful narrative experience paying tribute to the visual and storytelling techniques of the thriller genre. Investigate through the vision of three characters: everyone has a different story to tell. Explore several timelines to cross-check the events and separate reality from deceptive memories. Prepare yourself for a disturbing investigation inside the human mind: the truth is sometimes worse than madness…

name: Command Heroes
description:
Mullets, missiles, and monsters fly in a hectic, intergalactic resource race. Build bases, command troops, pilot vehicles, collect elemental artifacts to supercharge weapons, level up, upgrade almost anything, and master unique hero abilities. Multiple game modes keep strategies fresh.

Battle it out in a mash-up between a twin-stick action platformer & RTS blend. Play with 1-3 friends for 4-player split-screen action, or a custom map with up to 10 players & AI.

name: Dream Team: Kid's Typing
description: Spooky, a talkative ghost who lives in the attic of an all-American home, uses humor and games to teach kids how to type. Built-in intelligence enables him to continuously create new lessons based on your child's typing accuracy and speed. Starting with simple lessons that teach the location of the keys, your child will advance through exercises and games that challenge problem areas. Printable reports allow you to track progress.

name: Ookami Game
description:
12 people are all gathered together inside of a mysterious building, who are then forced to play the "Wolf Game".

Each person must draw a card. One person draws the wolf card, and must kill another player. Everyone else draws a sheep card, and must find out who the wolf is in a trial. If the wolf is found out, they are then executed.

To escape from the building, the players must find every wolf - and in the process, discover the truth to this game.

name: Avatar Life
description:
Welcome to Avatar Life, an Android free game where communication has no boundaries!
Avatar Life is both a chat and a simulation at the same time. Create your own avatar and become whoever you want: a party or an upright girl! You can choose the sex of your avatar and choose the best appearance and stylish image for it!

name: Corpse Party: Rebuilt
description: Corpse Party -Rebuilt- is the fan based remake of the original Corpse Party developed by an anonymous member of a Japanese message board, faithfully adding only improved graphics and mechanics, and extending one of the endings.

name: Dragon Break Classic
description: Dragon Break Classic is an arcade game that lets the user break pixel fantasy characters with a unique shield paddle and ball. Unique animated fantasy pixel levels, Mini-Bosses and powerups to collect while you progress through the levels. Thirty Levels to play in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory. Single player retro-arcade fun!

name: Ido no Akai
description: A young boy called Dell faces a horrible tragedy: his older brother has gone missing. He can’t depend on anyone besides himself, so he decides to wander through a dangerous forest near their house. But this dark and silent forest isn’t as safe as it seems…

name: Shiro no Shinju
description:
Prequel to Ido no Akai.
Echo is a 13 years old girl who lives completely alone in an abandoned house, without any friends but the forest animals. People say she's a witch, but is that only a rumor? Or is there a true witch hiding our there?

name: Gray Death
description:
In a world full of demons and the undead, a man searches for his lost wife. Resources are limited. Death is instant and waiting in the darkness. You will be running, jumping, climbing and searching in this 2D or 2.5D puzzle platformer.

Gray Death is a linear horror themed puzzle platformer, reminiscent of classic games like Solomon's Key and Dangerous Dave. The 20+ levels are short but challenging. You can either shoot or avoid enemies. You'll need to search for supplies and ammunition.

name: Debris
description:
Elyzabeth awakens in a cell after being attacked at the entrance to her apartment. She'll spend a long time trying to find a way out and an explanation to this, but she'll soon discover that she is not alone there.

The phone will start ringing in the room and when she picks it up, Elyzabeth won't believe what she hears:

"Hi Ellie.
You may be wondering where you are.
You Ellie, you're the reason for my pain.
And the time has come for you to pay for everything you've done to me.
This will be... the last day of your life. "

Will you dare to try to reveal the motives behind Elyzabeth's kidnapping?

name: Debris II
description:
Debris II starts with a meeting of police officers at the station: Frank, Pit and Nicole. At the meeting, Frank explains everything about a new kidnapping case involving four boys between the ages of 11 and 13. Apparently, the madman who committed this crime has sent a personalized invitation to Frank to go with other two people to an abandoned theater, where, according to the invitation, the play "Kidnapping of a Hummingbird" will begin at 23:00.

The dark adventure of Frank, Pit and Nicole begins. What are the kidnapper's motivations? Why did they send the invitation to Frank expressly?

name: Debris 3: The Devil In I
description:
Years after the events in the abandoned theater (Debris II) we return to Axl's story, Frank's son, who is now a man and an excellent university student.

During all these years Axl, along with his adoptive mother Sharon, have been taking care of Emily, another of the girls involved in the theater event. But all that peace and harmony seems to fade away when on a Friday afternoon, Axl receives a strange call from someone asking for help.

After thinking about it for a while and Emily's name being mentioned, Axl decides to go to the Crystal Palace to see what's going on, unaware that it could possibly be his last getaway from his adoptive parents' home.

It will be then that a mysterious girl will appear. Who is she? And why that obsessive attitude with Axl?

name: Ken-chan to Chie Asobi
description: Ken-chan to Chie Asobi is a SoundLink game released for the Satellaview. It is a game in which Ken and his sister Yo-chan solve an intelligence test quiz. In the meantime, it seems that a puppet show with songs and voices was broadcast.

name: Fantage
description:
Fantage was a MMORPG involving a virtual world containing a range of online games and activities, developed by Fantage Inc. The game features a customizable cartoon avatar, called a "Fantagian", that users can customize with items ranging from hair to clothing and accessories.

Has been closed down since June 30, 2018.

name: Yocchan to Chie Asobi
description: Yocchan to Chie Asobi is a SoundLink game released for the Satellaview. It is a game in which Ken and his sister Yo-chan solve an intelligence test quiz. In the meantime, it seems that a puppet show with songs and voices was broadcast.

name: Yuki no Jigsaw Kids
description: Yuki no Jigsaw Kids is a puzzle game released for the Satellaview, which is a version of Jigsaw Party.

name: Sugoi RPG II
description: Sugoi RPG II is a game made with RPG Tsukuuru Super Dante and released for the Satellaview as a stand-alone game. It is the second in the Sugoi RPG series.

name: Dungeon Royale
description: Dungeon Royale is an action-rpg battle-royale with rogue-lite elements. Slay the other adventurers to win the game or die and rebirth as a monster of the dungeon to get your revenge!

name: Sugoi RPG III
description: Sugoi RPG III is a game made with RPG Tsukuuru Super Dante and released for the Satellaview as a stand-alone game. It is the third in the Sugoi RPG series.

name: Lullaby
description:
Just married and with a long life ahead them, Marth and Kira drive from Washington to enjoy a beautiful honeymoon in Albuquerque.
But what none of them expect is that on the way a huge storm will force them to stop and seek refuge.
Trying to find a safe place, they end up entering a strange house in the middle of the highway, initially abandoned. Not exactly like that because Eve lives there, a sweet lady who has lived alone since the death of her husband with only the company of a white-furred cat.
After explaining what happened, Eve graciously agrees to let them stay until the storm subsides. Neither Marth nor Kira wanted to stay the night, but the weather conditions will force them to stay overnight.

The minutes pass and the rain does not stop. Lightning strikes the roof and Kira wakes up startled. But where is Marth? And what are those strange noises behind the walls?

Help Kira find Marth and find out what's going on in the house.

name: Octopath Traveler: Traveler's Compendium Edition
description:
A role-playing game from the Bravely Default team is being developed exclusively for the Nintendo Switch. They have brought a new world to life through a mix of CG, pixel art, and "HD-2D" visuals.

The Traveler's Compendium Edition contains:
Octopath Traveler Game
Double-Sided cloth World Map of Osterra
Replica of a Leaf Coin, the in-game currency
8-Page Pop-up Book with Item Compartments

name: Disomnia: Lullaby
description:
Direct sequel to Lullaby.

Eight years after what happened in Eve's house, Kira encounters a new conflict that will engulf the entire city of Salt Lake City in a new curse.

The story focuses on delving into the privacy of each of the adventure's three heroines: Kira, Avril, and Gisele. This way, as we advance through the two worlds that surround Salt Lake City, we will discover the past of each character and their reasons for acting as they do during the story.

name: Casino Bar Mokuyoubi: Poker
description: Casino Bar Mokuyoubi: Poker is a game released for the Satellaview which is a port of Kouryaku Casino Bar.

name: Ghost Exorcism Inc.
description:
Do you feel like you have the soul of an exorcist? Do you have the desire to send evil entities back to the afterlife? Would you prefer this thrill as a solo exorcist, or in a team?

Ghost Exorcism Inc. is a spooky game about exorcisms. The exorcist's mission is to cleanse entities that haunt locations such as castles, mansions, and abandoned houses. Exorcists will have several paranormal tools at their disposal; such as the EMF K2 detector, the entity analyzer, the threat detector, surveillance cameras, etc.
Once the threat has been identified- you can follow the given exorcism protocol, using equipment such as the neutrino-gun, holy water, incense (and more) to send the supernatural entities back to where they came from.

name: Dezaemon BS-X Version: Sugoi STG!! Jintai
description: Dezaemon BS-X Version: Sugoi STG is a game made with Dezaemon and released for the Satellaview.

name: Left 4 Dead 2: The Last Stand
description: "The Last Stand" is a two-map campaign remake of the Left 4 Dead survival mission of the same name, made by the Left 4 Dead 2 community. It was released as part of The Last Stand Update—the fourth DLC for Left 4 Dead 2—on September 24, 2020.

name: Broken Bottles
description:
Broken Bottles is a Yume Nikki fangame where you explore a girl's subconscious by falling into an induced sleep and you find what troubles lie in her mind.

You start out in Dokutsuki's room. Once you have fallen asleep, you can choose from many doors in a corridor to start exploring her subconscious. The effects change what the character looks like and sometimes her abilities. Just wander around and enjoy.

name: Left 4 Dead: The Last Stand
description: "The Last Stand" is a "campaign" exclusive to Survival Mode. It was introduced in Survival Pack—the first DLC for Left 4 Dead.

name: When It's Safe Again
description: A love letter to a life, post-lockdown.

name: 9-gatsu no Yoru ni Tsume Shogi
description: 9-gatsu no Yoru ni Tsume Shogi is a version for Satellaview of Super Tsume Shougi which distributed different challenges in the nights of September in 1997.

name: Nichibutsu Mahjong
description: Nichibutsu Mahjong is a modified version of Super Nichibutsu Mahjong 4: Kiso Kenkyu Hen.

name: Con Rồng Cháu Tiên
description: Loose bitsy retelling of the Vietnamese origin myth.

name: Satella de Picross
description: Satella de Picross is a puzzle game for the Satellaview.

name: Kero-Go!
description:
You are a small frog with a really big tongue, and you somehow got caught up in an even bigger mess.

Stick your slimy tongue to fling yourself through danger, and save the day in this adventurous and challenging frog-based 2D platformer!

name: Slimes
description:
Of the things that came with the arrival of an alien being, the weakest of all of them are the slimes. Nobody knows what exactly these things are, but, as weak as they are, nobody's succeeded in destroying one of the dungeons from which they spawn.

Julius Anderson, a modern day crusader, takes the job of eradicating one of these slime dens. Hired on to help him is, well, Julius refuses to learn his name, on account of him being "diseased" with magic, but he's a healer. Through teeth-clenched teamwork, can the duo reach the bottom floor and destroy the source of the slimes?

name: Moonshades
description: Moonshades is a dungeon crawler role-playing game for Android and iOS in order to restore the immersive atmosphere and experience of the old-school RPGs.

name: The Lost Night
description: You wake up in the middle of a spooky town trying to find your way back home. Help the citizens of this weird town and they will open paths for you.

name: Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No.1: Haru no Zenkoku Tournament
description: A SoundLink game using "糸井重里のバス釣りNo.1 (Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No.1)". Only players who own the "Bass Tsuri No.1" game can participate in the event, otherwise the player participates in the garbage-picking-up event. The players compete for total weight of five basses. 100 higher-ranking winners qualify for the final tournament. Shigesato Itoi, bass professional Kawabe, Ogimori Jyunko Hagimori, and Kyoko Koizumi appeared on the event.

name: Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No.1: Natsu no Zenkoku Tournament
description: A SoundLink game using "糸井重里のバス釣りNo.1 (Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No.1)". Only players who own the "Bass Tsuri No.1" game can participate in the event, otherwise the player participates in the garbage-picking-up event. The players compete for total weight of five basses. 100 higher-ranking winners qualify for the final tournament. Shigesato Itoi, bass professional Kawabe, Ogimori Jyunko Hagimori, and Kyoko Koizumi appeared on the event.

name: Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No.1: Aki no Zenkoku Tournament
description: A SoundLink game using "糸井重里のバス釣りNo.1 (Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No.1)". Only players who own the "Bass Tsuri No.1" game can participate in the event, otherwise the player participates in the garbage-picking-up event. The players compete for total weight of five basses. 100 higher-ranking winners qualify for the final tournament. Shigesato Itoi, bass professional Kawabe, Ogimori Jyunko Hagimori, and Kyoko Koizumi appeared on the event.

name: Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No.1: Fuyu no Zenkoku Tournament
description: A SoundLink game using "糸井重里のバス釣りNo.1 (Itoi Shigesato no Bass Tsuri No.1)". Only players who own the "Bass Tsuri No.1" game can participate in the event, otherwise the player participates in the garbage-picking-up event. The players compete for total weight of five basses. 100 higher-ranking winners qualify for the final tournament. Shigesato Itoi, bass professional Kawabe, Ogimori Jyunko Hagimori, and Kyoko Koizumi appeared on the event.

name: Dai-ikkai Satellaview-hai Ikuno Dictus Kinen Junkesshou/Kesshou
description: One of the betting events of Derby Stallion 96.

name: Dai-ikkai Satellaview-hai Satella Derby Junkesshou/Kesshou
description: One of the betting events of Derby Stallion 96. It had SoundLink support.

name: Dai-ikkai Satellaview-hai Satella Sprint Stakes Junkesshou/Kesshou
description: One of the betting events of Derby Stallion 96.

name: Dai-ikkai Satellaview-hai Sharrood Kinen Junkesshou/Kesshou
description: One of the betting events of Derby Stallion 96.

name: Tuned Turtle
description: Tuned Turtle is a wacky 2D platformer inspired by the "Tortoise x Hare" tale. Tune up your shell with mighty power-ups and cross the finish line before "Loko Rabbit". You are the only hope to save a village in ruins from the hands of the greedy "Dirty Duke".

name: Adventure for a Bit
description: Teach an AI named Bit to make a perfect procedural world.

name: Derpy Deep Drive
description: An Endless Bus Driving Game, created for Ludam Dare 48 created in Unrea Engine 4.

name: The Door
description: The Door is an escape room game with teleportation based puzzles. Planned for a full launch at some point in the year 2021. The initial publication was July 9th of 2020, and is playable on Windows, and Android.

name: Swordsman of Persia: Ancient Story
description: An action/platformer game, centering around the protagonist Bahram going on a journey to seek revenge after his home city is invaded.

name: Project QT
description:
Project QT is a Puzzle RPG with a lot more to offer than simple puzzle game mechanics. Strap in, and get ready to join the greatest adventure this side of the multiverse!
Take the hottest cuties you have ever dreamed of, explore an entertaining new universe, add some exciting battles to the mix, and you have the perfect recipe for fun!
With so many girls you can evolve, level up, and upgrade, there is always a mission for you here. And the rewards are that much better! Seduce the girls as you fight your way through levels, and you will be able to unlock steamy hentai scenes that will have your heart pumping.

name: DoReMi-ya no Original Sound Witch: Blue Sound Witch
description: DoReMi-ya Original Sound Witch is a SoundLink compatible game for the Satellaview from the Milon series.

name: DoReMi-ya no Original Sound Witch: Power Sound Witch
description: DoReMi-ya Original Sound Witch is a SoundLink compatible game for the Satellaview from the Milon series.

name: Winning Love by Daylight
description: Winning Love by Daylight is a Visual Novel that puts you directly amongst the action as a High School student who slowly uncovers the secret that several of their classmates are actually magical girl super heroes!

name: Carrier Command 2
description: Carrier Command 2 is Strategy, Planning and Teamwork on a scale that is both engaging and manageable. True to MicroProse's heritage and the debut title of the development company Geometa , Carrier Command 2 is all about meaningful decisions.

name: Shashingo: Learn Japanese With Photography
description: An edutainment game that teaches you Japanese through virtual photography. With your trusty camera, take photographs of the fictional streets of Japan to capture new words and images as fully translated flash cards!

name: Angel Saga
description: Experience the great-escape action adventure of Myel, an angel who was summoned to the underworld.

name: Ontei no Ein: Mahou Shikake no Chouritsushi
description:
This is a puzzle, adventure game in which you will need a good ear to bring the world back alive!

Repair 10 magical music boxes by playing or rewinding different music tracks as you navigate the environments and manipulate the objects each one contains.

name: Virtual Town
description: Save Virtual Town! There is a little town in your device, and they need your help. Their Mayor has left under mysterious circumstances, and the town is a mess. Help bring things back to their former glory. Help attract new residents, restore the buildings, solve mysteries, and unlock the secrets of Virtual Town! From the Creators of Virtual Families and Virtual Villagers.

name: Xposed
description:
Xposed is a modern and challenging tribute to the arcade classics.
Avoid opponents, be aware of your surroundings, expose the covered area and have lots of fun.
Uncover dozens of unique backgrounds and unlock more level packs while mastering your skills.
Simple controls, demanding levels, but rewarding experience.

name: Shokujinki
description: A man-eating monster wakes up, in a snowy night. He meets a mysterious girl willing to die. This omnibus novel game tells the story of the strange interaction between them.

name: Fuzz Dungeon
description: The well back to your job has been absorbed inside a sasquatch sex amulet. Journey through 15 levels of absurdist human history to try and bring it back.

name: Remains
description: Remains - survival in outer space orbiting the planet. Explore the area. Find a way to restore oxygen. Create tools for your needs. Beware of the dangers of outer space. Build your shelter in orbit and try not to die!

name: Blood Drop
description: Blood Drop is a competitive, speedrun-focused 2D platformer with online leaderboards where only the fastest players can claim to be there. Explore, collect the DNA items to unlock all the levels, and find the fastest paths to the end.

name: Attention Heroes!
description: A currently in-development game about hogging the spotlight from your fellow superheroes.

name: Mephisto Genius 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Push It In
description: A sliding block puzzle game.

name: Hong Kong Mahjong
description: Sin descripción

name: Socrates Chess 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Solar Danmaku
description: An indie bullet hell game in which players must take on a fleet of enemies after finding their home world destroyed.

name: Ochitsubaki
description: OCHITSUBAKI is a bilingual JPN/ENG transgender fantasy visual novel with an experimental poetic storytelling structure, a retro anime aesthetic, and a lush original orchestral soundtrack

name: H.E.L.P.: The Heroes Enhancing Lives Program
description: The Heroes Enhancing Lives Program (HELP) is now hiring for new talent! Are you a team player who works hard, can handle challenging situations, and questions the status quo? This fulfilling position is located at the peaceful hamlet where you can enjoy homely, local cuisine or take a breather at the nearby forest path.

name: ppL: The Animated Adventures
description:
A challenging 2D platformer with hard boss fights and unique mechanics. Contains several bosses and platformer levels.
Includes two difficulties, different weapon choices, different paths of passing through the game and a lot of surprises...

name: Volk-san: Egg&Catch
description: A very tiny, cute, and rather fast-paced game about an egg-loving wolf catching eggs.

name: Dying Light 2: Stay Human - Deluxe Edition
description:
Dying Light 2: Stay Human - Deluxe Edition includes:
- Dying Light 2 Stay Human
- Access to a story DLC
- Exclusive weapon charms
- Legendary Skins Pack
- Wallpapers ready to print
- Digital comic & Artbook & Soundtrack

name: Marsupilami: Hoobadventure - Collector's Edition
description:
Marsupilami: Hoobadventure - Collector's Edition includes:
- Game: Marsupilami: Hoobadventure
- 2 sticker sheets
- 1 Double-sided Door Hanger
- 14cm Marsupilami figurine

name: Sonic Colors: Ultimate - Launch Edition
description: Join Sonic on an intergalactic journey, fully remastered for a new generation -- with a few new features, too! The launch edition comes with a baby Sonic keychain!

name: The Legend of Heroes: Kuro no Kiseki - Spriggan Edition
description:
The Spriggan Edition is a Japan-only release that includes:

- Game: The Legend of Heroes: Kuro no Kiseki
- The Legend of Heroes: Kuro no Kiseki Soundtrack Mini with Tall Case
- The Legend of Heroes: Kuro no Kiseki Early Materials Book: "To The Land of Origin and Dawn"
- The Arcride Solution Office Character Data File

name: Disgaea 6: Defiance of Destiny - Unrelenting Edition
description:
The first new DISGAEA game in six years is here! Meet Zed, a zombie that has risen above them all except one - a God of Destruction!

Can a mere Netherworld zombie rise up and destroy a god? Find out in the newest installment of the DISGAEA series! Features such as Super Reincarnation, 3D visuals (a first for this series), and adjustable gameplay settings make this the perfect game for both new and old DISGAEA fans!

Unrelenting Edition (NSW) includes:
- Disgaea 6: Defiance of Destiny for Nintendo Switch
- "Defiance of Dissonance" Soundtrack Digital Download
- "Behind the Seam" Mini Art Book
- Reversible Coversheet

name: Rayman Raving Rabbids
description: Rayman Raving Rabbids is a 2D sidescrolling platform game that was released exclusively for the Game Boy Advance in 2006. With a traditional adventure story and gameplay that is almost identical to that of Rayman 3 on the Game Boy Advance, it stands in sharp contrast to the other iterations of Rayman Raving Rabbids, almost all of which are minigame-based party games. It is the last game in the Rayman series to be released for the Game Boy Advance, and the only Rabbids game for the system.

name: Family Quiz 6
description: A compilation of 4 quiz games

name: The Poisoned Roots
description: The Poisoned Roots is a narrative driven game about abuse, obsession, and the dark secrets of a troubled American home. It's a short game, and is intended to be played in a single sitting.

name: ADK Damashii
description:
PS4 port of PS2 ADK Damashii.

It includes 5 arcade/Neo Geo games which were all developed by ADK and published by SNK Playmore. All 5 are 1:1 arcade ports with only one small enhancement in the form of skill lists/move lists for the characters of the fighting games; nothing else was changed. They are all 2D Games and every game is for 1-2 players.

Includes Aggressors of Dark Kombat, Ninja Master's: Haō Ninpō Chō, Ninja Combat, Ninja Commando and Twinkle Star Sprites.

name: Flick Club
description: A competitive sliding blocks puzzle game with both an 18+ mode and a no nudity esports mode.

name: Wizard
description:
Wizard was to be the last of Atari's 2600 games, but went unreleased in favor of the new 5200 games. Chris Crawford puts it this way:

"Wizard was spec'd as a 2K game, but just four months later, when it was ready, the marketing people had decided that everything should be 4K, so they asked me if I could expand it to 4K. To be honest, I really didn't want to work on the 2600 -- I was eager to get going on the 800. So I told them that you don't just expand a 2K game to 4K: you start from scratch and design it for 4K from the ground up. That was true, and marketing lost interest, so I got to move to the 800."

Since Wizard was never advertised in any Atari catalogs and it was never assigned a part number, most people don't even know if its existence.

Wizard can best be described as a cross between Berzerk and Wizard of Wor. You control a wizard (at least I think he's a wizard), who must attempt to destroy the swirling star shaped creature. The board layout is a giant maze, which makes it hard to run from the creature and to get a clean shot off. Unfortunately the creature can move through the maze walls, but thankfully it can't shoot through them. Once you take a shot you'll notice that your wizard dims a bit, this means you are recharging, and cannot shoot. Once your wizard is done recharging he will light back up again, and you can take another shot. You don't have to worry about aiming you shots, as you will automatically shoot in the direction of the creature. This makes it easy to run away but still take shots at the creature.

name: Loopmancer
description: Loopmancer is a 3D horizontal roguelite action game with realistic graphics that takes place in a cyberpunk universe. Players play as a detective who comes back to life after an unexpected death, and battle in this lifelike and futuristic city of the east.

name: Onslaught
description: Sin descripción

name: Uno: Flip
description:
Jump into a new Uno experience with the Uno Flip! DLC!
Rediscover the matching game you know with a double-sided deck that gives classic gameplay an exciting twist.
Use the special Flip card to flip the deck and reveal an entirely new set of numbers, colors and Action cards on the opposite side!
Play nice with the "Light Side" Action cards or spice things up with these ""Dark Side"" ones:
- Draw five cards : The next player must draw five cards and lose their turn.
- Skip everyone card : All players lose their turn.
- Wild draw color card : The next player must draw until they get a color of your choice (no matter how many cards they have to draw to do so) and lose their turn.
Bring your UNO matches to the next level with UNO FLIP!

name: Uno: 50th Anniversary
description: It's time to celebrate the golden anniversary of the popular card game with UNO 50th Anniversary DLC! We've put on our black-tie best for such an occasion. Featuring all the fast-paced fun and unpredictable twists you love and based on the stunning physical edition of the game. It's time to celebrate in style!

name: Uno: Just Dance Theme DLC
description:
One of the most iconic card games ever is now getting a little bit funkier!

Get ready to move, UNO fans… the Just Dance theme is now available for UNO! Experience crazy games in a cool play space filled with upbeat, pulsating rhythms and funky effects as you and your friends try out all-new Just Dance Theme Cards. This time, all Theme Cards affect everyone instead of just one opponent; it’s a party, after all! However, savvy players will find ways to capitalize on these new Theme Cards and really mess with everyone else’s groove, whether it’s slowing down the speed of a round by penalizing action cards or taking advantage of someone else’s lead. So grab your friends, turn the volume up, and deal out some cards—the Just Dance theme is ready to bring even more life and unpredictable fun to your UNO matches!

name: Uno: Rayman Theme DLC
description:
One of the most iconic card games ever is now getting a dose of extra adventure!

For Rayman and his band of friends, the adventure continues in the UNO Rayman Theme! Enjoy your matches in a lush and lively environment as you and your opponents find creative, new ways to mess with each other’s chances for victory. With four brand-new and original Theme Cards, you’ll be able to hide your lead from others, swat cards back at their players (yes, even Wild Draw Fours), or mix up everyone’s hands if you’re feeling particularly daring at the time. Excitement, surprises, and more await you in the UNO Rayman Theme!

name: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night 2
description: Sin descripción

name: High & Low: Aim! 26 Consecutive Wins!
description: Feel free to play that Trump mini-game "HIGH & LOW"! 26 consecutive wins for 5,000 trillion yen! Let's win by looking at the remaining cards and history!

name: Mr. Rainer's Solve-It Service
description:
"In FLATSPACE, on HJÖ, where HJÖRIANS live in DOMES in symbiosis with RAINCOATS...you'll find MR.RAINER'S SOLVE-IT SERVICE.

You've got a problem - we solve it."

One day, HEINO's partner dies. He gets a new one.

name: Rollers of the Realm: Reunion
description:
Rollers of the Realm: Reunion—sequel to the winner of GDC’s prestigious “Best in Play” award in 2014—is a medieval-themed RPG featuring a clever spin on pinball where the ball features attributes similar to a traditional RPG character.

Rollers of the Realm: Reunion features easy-to-learn controls and an adventure-filled game world inspired by classic pinball cabinets. Players will bounce, flip, and dash through physics-based puzzles to progress the story while leveling up a party of misfit heroes on an epic journey to new worlds.

Each character is represented by a ball that offers distinct gameplay modifiers, sizes, stats, and “specials,”—making battles and puzzle-solving a tactical affair where hot-swapping heroes is a must. Sending in a knight to do a mage’s job might not be the smartest move!

name: Ascendants Rising
description: Ascendants Rising is a co-op Action RPG that lets you create your own unique playstyle and team to explore an ever-changing Multiverse teeming with deadly enemies, formidable Boss fights, and amazing loot.

name: Rise of Hegemony
description: Take control of a country from its very first beginnings and lead it successfully to become a global hegemon. In a complex simulation of economy, diplomacy and warfare the path you chose to triumph is up to you.

name: Dingdang Rompers Dating Game
description: You are Naegi and you are searching for the kawaii love of your life around Brazil.

name: Mars After Midnight
description: A Playdate game by the Indie developer Lucas Pope, known for games such as Return of the Obra Dinn and Papers Please

name: HetaOni
description:
HetaOni is a Hetalia fangame based on the popular horror RPG game Ao Oni by noprops, first made by Tomoyoshi with RPG Maker XP (this version was just shown as videos) and then programmed with RPG Maker VX by Pianodream and NeoKyno to make it playable.

The game is about the Axis Powers and the Allies being trapped in a mansion, but legends say that this mansion was haunted.

name: Nair
description: A simple fighting game with one attack.

name: RomaHeta
description:
A Hetalia fangame programmed into an English-language game by Kia Lao based on the original Japanese fangame.

Japan creates a new video game. However, an error happens, the error becoming sentient (taking the form of a doppelganger of Japan) and sucks characters into the game. The error is slowly trying to trap them in the game, and sometimes uses his powers to 'infect' people with a virus, causing them to come under his control.

name: Dona Vasa
description: A difficult 2D platformer.

name: Pupper's Garden
description: Pupper's Garden is a little game about a little pupper with puppersized dreams. Spending her days watching through the window as people dig holes in their gardens and hide things within, only for happy little greens to soon spout in their place, until one day she decides that she wants to have fun outside too and with the help of a moo, make a garden of her own.

name: Wander the Cosmos
description: Wander the Cosmos is a space exploration game in which you, the pilot of a spacecraft called The Discovery, have been sent on a mission by the Galactic Federation to gather data on any & all celestial objects you come across during your travels.

name: Farworld Pioneers
description: Farworld Pioneers is a sci-fi, sandbox, colony management game with survival elements and direct NPC control. Establish self-sufficient colonies and fulfill the needs of colonists. Engage in physics based gunplay as you travel the stars. Pilot mechs and vehicles, build bases, and interact with wildlife!

name: Crankin's Time Travel Adventure
description: Crankin loves taking naps, but that is always the cause of more trouble. Being late to work or missing flights, and today he woke from a nap at the exact time he was supposed to meet a date. Advance or rewind Crankin's timeline. Hurry to the meeting place where your loved one, Crankette, is waiting, and apologize for being late.

name: Apparition
description: Apparition is the story of Heather and Eden: a displaced young adult taking refuge in an abandoned house, and the ghost of its previous occupant. When their otherworldly bond is threatened, Heather must find a way to summon the love of her life from the beyond.

name: Is Lupin Still Flirting?
description: Master Thief Lupin the Third is always two steps ahead of his eternal nemesis, the ICPO's Inspector Zenigata. But occasionally, Zenigata is lucky enough to slap a pair of cuffs onto Lupin, and today is one of those days. On the train ride over to the hoosegow, Lupin's time is dwindling, and it's time to cash in on Zenigata's biggest weakness: his longstanding crush on his eternal rival. This short visual novel has four endings, and all the visuals are traditionally crafted with watercolor and fountain pen! Please enjoy and flirt your way to freedom!

name: Battleship Godios
description: Battleship Godios is a game with a high level of difficulty and trial & error gameplay that makes retrying inevitable. Use the limited number of bullets to break down battleships!

name: Boogie Loops
description: A pizza, a bunny, a cactus, and a panda wander into the woods. Nobody suspects they can dance, but secretly they share dreams of spreading their fuzzy, spikey, cheesy joy far beyond the woods and into the great wide world. But there's a problem: they’re missing music. That's where you come in. Set the beats for their boogie, the tones for their twerk, the swing for their steps.

name: Casual Birder
description: Casual Birder is a snap-'em-all adventure set in beautiful seaside Bird Town. You've just moved into a birdwatcher's paradise… At least it used to be, before some bad eggs moved in and shoved the competition out of the nest. Can a fledgling photographer like you make a mark in the cut-throat world of hobby bird photography? Better get crankin'!

name: Demon Quest '85
description: In Demon Quest '85 you play an ordinary, everyday kid with ordinary, everyday problems. You also have a magical book for summoning demons from the lowest circles of Hell so that they can help you be more popular at school.

name: New Spirits
description: A horror adventure game.

name: Echoic Memory
description: Echoic Memory is a musical puzzle game that utilizes the player's own sensory memory and a playful twist of the crank. With two modes, its story mode explores the meaning of memories. Echoic Memory was made by a small team before and during the pandemic.

name: Planet of Crawlers
description:
Planet of Crawlers is a 1-player science fiction themed arcade game for the Apple II.

The player controls a spaceship on the bottom of the screen which moves horizontally and can fire vertically. The player has to avoid mushrooms, as well as a white and orange spiders. The spiders move towards the player, bouncing off the edges of the play area. The white spider moves more vertically, while the red one prefers a larger angle. These identical two monsters appear repeatedly. The player has 20 ships, and it's game over when all are lost. the player is awarded points for spiders killed.

name: Sutte Hakkun
description:
This version was released for use with the Nintendo Power cartridge, and included all the levels designed by game creators (which wasn't possible to do with the 8MB Satellaview Memory Pak). It was afterwards released as a Super Famicom standard cartridge and also for the japanese Wii and Wii U Virtual Console.

Sutte Hakkun is a puzzle action game in the shape of a platformer. The playing character is an abundant-beaked bird resembling a penguin, named Hakkun, that is able to walk and jump but not to fly. The Rainbow of Happiness shined in the sky above Peaceful Islands: one day it broke apart and now Hakkun has to track down, collect, and put together all rainbow crystals to relive it. The gameplay hinges upon two elements: blocks and potions, the latter of several colours. Hakku makes its way through levels by changing the position of blocks — that will be done by swallowing them to release them on an other place then — and sucking potions — that are to be injected to blocks by the beak, endowing them with new properties consequential to the colour of the fluid — from jars. A level is cleared when the rainbow shards in it are collected. Neither a time limit nor enemy characters are there impeding Hakkun's way. Equally distinctive is the score system: a set number of points is given at the beginning of each level, and a decrease happens with any move made, thus rewarding the player for completing levels with as little moves as possible.

name: Executive Golf DX
description: In Executive Golf DX, live the ultimate dream of corporate advancement by golfing your way to the top of a procedurally generated office building. Enterprising individuals may elect to use an array of unconventional abilities while climbing the ladder of success, but what will truly drive you towards greatness in business is the quality shared by all great thought leaders: A perfect backswing.

name: Flipper Lifter
description: Elevate these penguins to new heights! Using the Playdate's crank, take penguins through hotels, construction zones, and even into space! But watch out for those pesky eagles who are always looking for their next meal. Featuring 5 endless levels and local high scores, test your skills and your abilities as you manage these cute (but impatient) penguins.

name: Forrest Byrnes: Up in Smoke
description: Join FORREST BYRNES to fight a malignant blaze threatening our sumptuous woodlands! CAN you save the wayward campers? Will you SEE the danger that stalks the forest? Only YOU can help Forrest stop this shameful waste!

name: Hyper Meteor
description: You are lost in space! All weapons are down! Survive by ramming your ship into meteors and hostile forces.

name: Lost Your Marbles
description: Lost Your Marbles is a charming visual novel where the roll of a marble makes all the difference. Join PROTA in this branching-narrative adventure as she makes her way through Pomegranate Village on a quest to find her lost dog MINTY and make it to the annual Festi-Ball before day's end.

name: Omaze
description: Omaze is a circular puzzle platformer. An ode to circles. A hint to the never ending struggle against the perceived enemy.

name: Pick Pack Pup
description: Pick Pack Pup is a match-3 puzzle game where matches don't disappear immediately, making each new move trickier. In the game you play as Pup, the newest employee at a fulfillment center, who will discover the ups and downs of packing boxes and will unpack a lot of surprises along the way.

name: IFSCL: A Code Lyoko Fangame
description:
The IFSCL is an unofficial game of the animated show Code Lyoko, professionally made by a passionate french fan for more than a decade and still in production.
First and foremost, it's an interactive reproduction of the interface of the supercomputer that the nerd of the group, Jeremy, uses in an abandonned factory to send his friends in a dangerous virtual world, Lyoko. This is also 3D adventure game that happens within the 'real' world of the series.

name: Questy Chess
description: Deep in an ever advancing computer, forgotten and unchanged, remains chess program v1. Peace is shattered by a software update! Can you stop the invading bytes before being overwritten?

name: Ratcheteer
description: Play as an apprentice mechanic tasked with maintaining steam-powered cryo-colonies constructed for humanity to sleep out an impact winter following a celestial collision. Your master mechanic is abducted during some unplanned maintenance, setting off a lo-fi, top-down, action-adventure that finds the young Ratcheteer exploring the interconnected tunnels below the surface and a vast snowcean above to rescue friends, foes, and strangers alike.

name: Sasquatchers
description: Sasquatchers is a turn-based tactical cryptozoology game. The player controls a team of fame-seeking scientist-influencers traveling through increasingly dark and creepy forest areas, trying to set up the best possible angles for photos and video of elusive cryptids.

name: Snak
description: Snak is Snake plus jump.

name: Spellcorked!
description: In this laid-back magical gig economy crafting game, you are a recently-graduated young witch trying to thrive in a digital age. With a bit of help and a lot of love, fulfill potion orders for people you never meet, and try to get the best reviews you can!

name: Zipper
description: Zipper is a tactics puzzle that recalls 8-bit isometric classics on the ZX Spectrum and MSX. A ridiculously swift swordsman seeks revenge on a castle full of enemies.

name: Saturday Edition
description: Saturday Edition tells the story of John Kornfield, a security technician who made headlines in 1976 with his account of alien abduction, life on another world, and eventual return to earth. Ten years later, Kornfield once again finds himself the subject of public interest when a string of disappearances coincide with sightings of mysterious lights in the night sky.

name: Recommendation Dog!!
description: Recommendation Dog!! is an adorable action-puzzle game about being a tiny dog with a very big job. You work at a temp agency, cranking through names in your rotary organizer to fulfill the wacky, lovely, and strange requests of the people who come through your door. Connect the right people with the places that need them, make fast-paced choices, and get the high score you deserve! Good boy. This is Recommendation Dog - and you are a very good boy indeed.

name: Reel Steal
description: Reel Steal is a heist game where a mysterious figure hires thieves to reclaim loot & justice. As renegades, nab appropriated art from evil billionaires, hurriedly making calling cards to leave in their place. The hook? You're armed only with a fishing pole.

name: Widget Satchel II: Return of Sprocket
description: Sin descripción

name: Oxy Con Brio
description: Sin descripción

name: Daily Driver
description: Sin descripción

name: Date of Life
description: Sin descripción

name: Faraway Fairway
description:
Faraway Fairway is arcade golf game that is procedurally generated and you'll never play the same game twice! Explore and interact as you make your way to the goal and uncover secrets as you progress and complete your photo album!

As a mental health golf game, Faraway Fairway game is designed to be a relaxing pick up and play. Taking care of your mental health should be like a vacation that never ends.

name: Getting There
description: Sin descripción

name: Robot Fishing
description: Sin descripción

name: Direct Drive
description: Direct Drive is a silent-movie-musical game about being an intern in the music industry in 1927.

name: Playmaker
description: Paint, compose, build, record, and dance your way across six playful creative spaces for your Playdate.

name: Blood Card 2: Dark Mist
description: Dark Mist is a card game that combines elements of the roguelike deckbuilder genre with enemies that appear in waves. Defeat monsters and level up during battle to keep yourself going.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 2 - Season 7
description: Chapter 2: Season 7, is the seventeenth season in Fortnite: Battle Royale that started on June 8th, 2021 and is set to finish on September 12th, 2021. Its theme revolves around an alien invasion and uses the slogan and title "Invasion."

name: Junior Education 2
description:
A compilation of 7 educational games designed for children between the age of 7 and 11:
- Crash
- Multiply
- Train
- Fraction
- Add Sub
- Division
- Spelling

name: Chunithm Crystal
description: The nineth version of the famous SEGA rhythm game, with both regular notes and air notes.

name: Open Brush
description: Open source VR art tool built off of Google's open sourced Tilt Brush

name: Tiny Planet Protectors
description: Welcome to the TPPA! Your assignment: Protect, Clean, and Discover. Collect resources and encounter the inhabitants of nearby galaxies as you also fill your home planet with alien plants, futuristic tools, and uncover the greatest threat to the universe.

name: Wonderland Dizzy
description: Wonderland Dizzy is a remake/expanded game of Magicland Dizzy. It was developed for the NES in 1993, but went unreleased until 2015, when it went released online free for download.

name: Edge of Tomorrow
description: A Mobile First-Person Shooter movie-tie in to the 2014 sci-fi action thriller Edge of Tomorrow.

name: Boomerang Kid
description: Boomerang Kid is an unlicensed game released with the Quattro Adventure compilation for the NES. It is a platformer developed by Codemasters in which the player controls a boy who has to recover his boomerangs.

name: Mahjong Nagomi
description: Authentic Japanese Mahjong has arrived! This isn't solitaire where you match tiles, this is the classic game. Mahjong is played with 4 players and full online multiplayer support is included. It's the most popular table game in Japan and now you can play online with your friends.

name: Anno 1800: Season Pass
description:
Enrich your city-building experience with the Anno 1800 Season Pass. The Season Pass contains 3 DLCs that will give you access to new adventures, challenges and tools as you shape your very own Industrial Revolution.

This Season Pass includes:
- The Sunken Treasures DLC: Expand your island with a new European session and large continental island, as you join an excentric inventor and his diving bell on a treasure hunt
- Botanica DLC: Grow your city's attractiveness to new heights with a modular Botanical Garden, allowing you to earn new items and rewards as you draw the tourist masses to your floral masterpiece
- The Passage DLC: Embark on a dangerous Arctic adventure as you try to find a long lost polar expedition on its journey to discover the legendary passage

name: Anno 1800: Season 2 Pass
description:
Take the industrial revolution further with the Anno 1800 Season 2 Pass, which includes 3 new DLCs to enhance your gameplay with new buildings, residential tiers and goods :
- Seat of Power :
Show off the power of your city with a prestigious palace and government departments that can boost your economy.
- Bright Harvest :
Bring the wonders of mechanised farming as you boost the efficiency of your farms with tractors and more.
- Land of Lions :
Travel to the Southern continent and join forces with an embattled Emperor to bring life to the desert using a new irrigation system.
And 3 exclusive ornaments

name: Anno 1800: Season 3 Pass
description:
The Anno 1800 Season 3 Pass includes the following three DLC:

DOCKLANDS

Turn your city into a global trade hub with a modular warehouse system and use trade contracts to create a monopoly on your favorite goods.

TOURIST SEASON

Attract the new Tourist resident tier to your city’s hotels and keep them entertained with restaurants and bus tours of touristic hotspots such as the new Tower monument.

THE HIGH LIFE

Change your empire’s skyline forever with the construction of the first skyscrapers and keep your high-flying investors happy with shopping malls and the construction of the game’s biggest monument, the Empire Building.

BONUS CONTENT

In addition, you will receive three exclusive ornaments themed after the new content, available today.

name: Why Not?
description: Why Not? is a horror game series, it has one mission for now and it's not easy. You need to fight with a creature and find a notebook for the government!

name: What is schlo?
description: Play as Dreygan, a teenage boy who has something quite shocking happen to him and is surrounded by boys who want to date him...?!

name: Aardvark
description: An open platform for building, sharing, and using augmented reality gadgets that run on top of virtual reality experiences

name: Spellbroken
description: In a land where a city of zealots stands surrounded by wilderness, the Handlers patrol the frontier. Collie, a newly-minted squad leader, finds herself on a mission with her two squadmates to an abandoned building in the wilds. There, she reflects on her past in the face of her seemingly blessed role, and will face a fateful decision.

name: Fishermen's Haven
description: Fishermen's Haven is a tranquil manager game in which you take control of a small coastal settlement located on a remote island. Guide your people through the hardships of life on a tropical isle, manage resources, and find the means to expand the village.

name: Kosaka-san.
description: After an unpleasant incident, the unnamed high-school student protagonist finds himself unable to make friends with most of his classmates. To escape the bustle of lunch time, he goes to the school rooftop. However, one day he finds there a girl who tells him a meteorite is about to hit Earth and wipe humanity, and that she wants to commit suicide before that happens.

name: No Humanity
description: The genre of the game is bullet hell without shoot'em up, it looks relatively low effort. It's like b-movies, it's so bad it's good. The game design philosophy behind is controlled chaos, if you can't control or learn from randomness, you might have a hard time mastering this very unique game. It also includes a handy map editor, a world explorer full of stuff created by our community, a fun fast paced multiplayer mode and lots of ships and cosmetics to unlock

name: Night Delivery
description: Night Delivery | 例外配達 is a psychological Japanese horror adventure game.

name: Ferocious
description: Ferocious is a survival shooter in which you will discover a lost prehistoric world full of deadly creatures under the control of hostile forces. Fight, Explore, Survive

name: Megopoly
description: Megopoly is the world’s first free-to-play board game where players build real estate empires. We’re currently in open beta and new features are released all the time so make sure to stake your claim now!

name: Undead Syndrome Episode 1
description: In The Undead Syndrome, players assume the role of a nameless, amnesiac woman who is stabbed and killed while walking through a desolate street during the daytime. She soon awakens only to find herself unceremoniously transported into a haunted house. Unable to distinguish nightmare from reality, the woman vows to unravel the facts in relation to her death and murderer.

name: Undead Syndrome Episode 2
description:
You managed to wake up from the nightmare and discovered a further challenge awaits you. Getting to the heart of the story.

The second part of the Undead Syndrome series!

name: Horrors of Space
description: Horrors of Space is a 4-player co-op survival horror game. You and 3 other crew members awaken from cryo sleep to find the Aries in a state of emergency, invaded by an alien creature. It’s up to you and your teammates to work together to get out alive.

name: Time Navigator
description:
Time Navigator is an educational American history game.

You have been selected to be part of an elite group to try out a new time-traveling vehicle. As your test, you will be sent back into the past. Your task is to navigate forwards by selecting the most recent event or item from groups of three.

name: Villagedom
description: Are you worthy of being a king? Test your mettle in this city-builder and resource management game as you develop your kingdom. Face challenges at every turn and transform your village into something mighty. Protect your subjects. Slay your enemies. Be a king!

name: Fossil Hunter
description:
Fossil Hunter is an educational game for the Apple II.

The player takes on the role of a fossil hunter, and has the opportunity to dig in a variety of rock layers to identify the contained fossilized animals. The player can learn more about the animal groups with a small encyclopedia included with the game.

name: Mystery Objects
description:
Mystery Objects is a logic game for the Apple II.

The player is presented with 6 objects, and must determine which object is hiding within the mystery box. To do this, the player can use tools to measure the color, weight, size, texture, smell, and shape of the object. The player must try to guess the object with the fewest tools as possible. There are 3 levels of difficulty.

name: Conquering Percents
description:
Conquering Percents is an educational game for the Apple II. Contains 3 mini-games to help students with learning percentages:

- Everything's on Sale: Help the store owner put items on sale. The player must calculate percent off, original prices, and sale price.
- Percent Chompers: The player controls a set of teeth which must chomp the correct percent or fraction on a 4 x 4 grid.
- Percent Factory: Try to guess what percentage of a shape is painted, or try to correctly paint the amount of a shape specified.

name: Handball Manager 07/08
description: Sin descripción

name: Mein neues Leben Abenteuer auf Tropicana
description: Sin descripción

name: Sea Park Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: Dying Light: Platinum Edition
description: Enjoy Dying Light in its richest form. Containing all four major DLCs and seventeen skin bundles, the Platinum Edition brings together everything you need to explore all the post-apocalyptic world has to offer.

name: Down the Oubliette
description: Down the Oubliette is an upcoming dungeon crawling tower defense game for the Playdate. Take on the ghost infestation below an abandoned country house.

name: TeamJumpers 2: New Reality
description:
The ambitious sequel from Imperfect Studios!
TeamJumpers 2: New Reality, is an ambitious sequel to TeamJumpers. And the focus on this one's theme is interdimensional travel. Every 10 levels, you will discover a new reality. With challenging bosses, a simple yet fun combat system, and secrets to be revealed, this world is yours to explore!

name: Manafinder
description: Take the role of Lambda as you are exiled from Manahill and thrown into the beautiful but unforgiving world of Aevi in this Japanese-style turn-based pixel-art RPG. Become a manafinder and seek the manastones as you battle against ferocious beasts and other threats as you fight for the survival of the exiles.

name: TKKG: Der Fälscherbande auf der Spur
description: Investigate with TKKG in a new, exciting case that you do not know from the radio plays or books!

name: EnigmaSand
description: A falling sand game by XavierSoft.
